job_name: Trưởng Nhóm Quản Trị Hệ Thống CNTT
LĨNH VỰC: Giáo dục/Đào Tạo
KỸ NĂNG: IT Security, IT Helpdesk, IT Infrastructure Management, IT Hardware, IT Project Management
Mô tả công việc: 1. Thiết lập, kiểm soát hệ thống hạ tầng CNTT:
1.1. Thiết lập và quản lý hạ tầng CNTT toàn Công ty

- Quản trị toàn bộ hệ thống máy chủ, phòng máy chủ, hệ thống Active Directory,hệ thống Email Server, hệ thống tên miền, website IIG, hệ thống mạng và các kết nối liên vùng có bảo mật kênh truyền, phân vùng mạng cho hoạt động thi tại phòng máy;
- Xây dựng quy trình, quy định, tiêu chuẩn, hướng dẫn triển khai và vận hành hạ tầng CNTT như hạ tầng mạng, hạ tầng điện toán đám mây,...
1.2. Vận hành hệ thống hạ tầng CNTT, hỗ trợ người sử dụng của Công ty
- Triển khai cấu hình thiết bị, cài đặt hệ điều hành và các phần mềm liên quan cho các thiết bị: camera, máy chấm công, máy tính người sử dụng, mail/Sms Marketing, VoIP, Máy in, Video Conference,...
- Quản lý công tác vận hành, duy trì sự hoạt động của các thiết bị CNTT văn phòng ổn định, an toàn và hiệu quả hàng ngày
- Tiếp nhận và tổ chức đội nhóm thực hiện hỗ trợ/tư vấn, xử lý sự cố phát sinh nhận được từ BTGĐ, PB/BP

- Phối hợp với PB chuyên môn lập kế hoạch và phân công nhân sự rà soát, kiểm tra, tư vấn, sửa chữa các trang thiết bị CNTT định kỳ. Đánh giá, đề xuất các giải pháp sửa chữa, thay thế, nâng cấp hệ thống, trang thiết bị kỹ thuật, Công nghệ thông tin đảm bảo hoạt động liên tục, đáp ứng nhu cầu phát triển của Công ty;
- Phân công nhân sự IT Helpdesk và tham gia các hoạt động tổ chức thi khi có yêu cầu và hỗ trợ, xử lý kỹ thuật sự cố trong quá trình Tổ chức thi
- Hỗ trợ đào tạo nghiệp vụ cho IT part-time khi có yêu cầu.
2. Xây dựng và tổ chức thực hiện ứng dụng hệ thống thông tin:
2.1. Xây dựng và triển khai tổ chức quản trị dữ liệu
- Xây dựng hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu (CSDL) tổng thể và thiết kế, xây dựng tài liệu kiến trúc cơ sở dữ liệu, mô hình hóa dữ liệu phục vụ phân tích dữ liệu
- Thiết kế kho dữ liệu, CSDL, bảng biểu, thủ tục, quyền hạn về dữ liệu làm cơ sở hỗ trợ thông tin cho Công ty
2.2. Xây dựng, triển khai và đánh giá các hệ thống phần mềm & ứng dụng CNTT
- Tham gia rà soát, đánh giá hiệu năng, tính năng, lên kế hoạch nâng cấp, tối ưu các thành phần/tính năng trong hệ thống
- Tham gia tư vấn về hạ tầng kỹ thuật (HW, OS, Networking, CSDL) cho các dự án triển khai hệ thống CNTT đảm bảo về giải pháp kỹ thuật & không làm sai lệch kiến trúc hệ thống chung
2.3. Quản lý dự án phần mềm (dự án chuyển đổi số)
3. Xây dựng các giải pháp và thực hiện quản trị rủi ro và an ninh mạng, an toàn dữ liệu:
- Quản trị và tổ chức triển khai thực hiện các giải pháp đảm bảo an ninh, an toàn thông tin trong hệ thống
CNTT thuộc Công ty, bao gồm: An ninh mạng, hệ thống bảo mật dữ liệu, hệ thống máy chủ, các ứng dụng
CNTT, hệ thống Tổng đài điện thoại;
- Xây dựng ma trận phân quyền, thẩm định và đánh giá các yêu cầu quyền ngoại lệ trên các hệ thống CNTT;
Kiểm tra, đánh giá các lỗ hổng bảo mật của hệ thống và lập phương án xử lý, vá lỗ hổng bảo mật đã phát
hiện;
4. Quản lý nhân sự team hệ thống
5. Tham gia nghiên cứu, xây dựng định hướng, chiến lược và kế hoạch CNTT và một số công việc chuyên môn khác theo yêu cầu của quản lý
Yêu cầu công việc: - Tốt nghiệp Đại học loại khá trở lên các ngành, chuyên ngành công nghệ, điện tử viễn thông hoặc CNTT,...;

- Từ 04 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực liên quan về triển khai và quản trị hệ thống, cơ sở dữ liệu, quản trị an toàn thông tin,... Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực giáo dục và có chứng chỉ quốc tế về mạng, bảo mật (CCNA, CCNP, CEH, CHFI,...);
- Từ 02 năm kinh nghiệm quản lý làm việc tại vị trí tương đương;
- Am hiểu về hệ thống mạng Lan, Wan, internet;
- Am hiểu về hệ điều hành Windows Server/Linux, ...;
- Am hiểu quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu SQL Server, hệ thống bảo mật;
- Nắm vững các quy định về bảo mật thông tin;
- Có khả năng đọc tài liệu, giao tiếp, email trao đổi công việc bằng tiếng Anh lĩnh vực chuyên môn;
- Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch, tổ chức các nguồn lực và quản lý, xử lý công việc hiệu quả;
- Kỹ năng tốt trong việc phân tích, tổng hợp và xử lý vấn đề, ra quyết định có tính hệ thống.

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Business Analysis, Product Operation, User Experience, Research, Communication
Mô tả công việc: ● Conduct comprehensive market research and user studies to identify user needs, preferences, and pain points related to document editing, collaboration, and workspace solutions.
● Collaborate with product managers and stakeholders to define product requirements, features, and specifications based on user feedback and market insights.
● Work closely with developers to translate business requirements into technical specifications and user stories, ensuring alignment with product objectives and user expectations.

● Facilitate communication and collaboration between cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and quality assurance testers, to ensure timely and successful delivery of product milestones and releases.

● Analyze product metrics and user feedback to identify areas for improvement and optimization, iterating on product features and functionality to enhance the user experience and drive user satisfaction.

● Stay informed about industry trends, competitive landscape, and emerging technologies related to document editing, collaboration, and workspace solutions, providing strategic insights and recommendations to inform product roadmap decisions.
Yêu cầu công việc: ● Must have 5 year’s experience as BA, Product management.
● Experience in saas or collaborative or enterprise product
● Agile & fast deployment
● Good communication skills in English
● Eye for Detail
● Documentation skills
● Understand user pain points
● Detail-oriented, problem-solving and lateral thinking

company_name: Ngân Hàng Thương Mại Cổ Phần Hàng Hải Việt Nam (MSB)
LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Công Nghệ Thông Tin, Test Cases, Agile Testing, API
Mô tả công việc: - Phân tích và thiết kế test case dựa trên những yêu cầu của Nghiệp vụ.
- Thực hiện việc test UI trên các nền tảng khác nhau như : Web Browser , Mobile Device.
- Thực hiện việc test tích hợp , test API , test Database nhằm mục đích đảm bảo chất lượng cho các dự án.
- Có thể thực hiện các yêu cấu liên quan đến Automation Test để hỗ trợ việc regression test , tích hợp với CI/CD dự án
Yêu cầu công việc: I. Kinh nghiệm chuyên môn:
1. Có kinh nghiệm test API, Database, Mobile.
2. Có kinh nghiệm design test case, test plan và làm tài liệu test.
3. Có kinh nghiệm phân tích và làm rõ yêu cầu từ dự án.
4. Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên trong mảng Manual Test hoặc Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên trong lĩnh vực Automation Test
II. Yêu cầu khác:
Skill giải quyết vấn đề với dev
Khả năng chịu áp lực trong công việc
Sẵn sàng học thêm các skill mới trong công việc như automation test, performance test…
Quyền lợi
Tham gia những siêu dự án với vốn đầu tư 2000 tỉ đồng, ứng dụng những công nghệ mới nhất.
Được dẫn dắt bởi đội ngũ quản lý giỏi chuyên môn, đánh giá công bằng. Cơ hội làm việc trực tiếp với các đối tác hàng đầu thế giới (AWS; BCG; IBM; Temenos...).

LĨNH VỰC: Thiết bị y tế
KỸ NĂNG: Technical Support, IT Helpdesk, Helpdesk, IT System Administration, IT Hardware
Mô tả công việc: -	IT Asset Management: Responsible to manage IT asset life cycle processes from planning, procurement, maintaining asset list according to asset life span and new purchase requirement.
-	Employee onboarding & offboarding: To ensure IT asset and services readiness on employee onboarding day and provide IT briefing timely.
-	Employee offboarding: To ensure employee are offboarded timely by revoking system access and services as per offboarding playbook and IT asset collection completion.
-	Providing technical assistance: Assist end-users with IT related issues, such as hardware, software, and network problems.
-	Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve technical issues, with systematic problem-solving techniques.
-	Customer support: Delivery excellent customer service by addressing user concerns and ensuring  satisfaction.
-	Installation and configuration: Set up and configure software, hardware, and peripherals for users.
-	Maintenance: Perform routine maintenance and updates on IT equipment and systems
-	Documentation: Keep detailed records of technical issues, solutions, and user request.
-	Training: Provide training and guidance to users on using IT resources effectively.
-	Remote support: Aid users remotely though phone, chat, or remote desktop tools.
-	Hardware repair: Diagnose and repair hardware problems and coordinate repairs with vendors.
-	Security: Assist in ensuring the security of IT systems and data by implementing security protocols and ed-ucating users about best practices.
-	Software support: Help users with software installations, updates and troubleshooting.
-	Backup and recovery:  Monitor regular data backup schedule daily to ensure continuity to protect against data loss.
-	System Monitoring: Monitor IT system defects to detect and resolve issues proactively.
-	Escalation: Escalate complex and unresolved issues to higher-level support or appropriate teams.
-	SEA Team support: To provide backup to team member in supporting SEA countries as one team.
-	Project Deployment: Main onsite coordinator for all IT project deployment / upgrade / enhancement in the country
-	Stay Updated: Keep up to date with the latest technology trends and developments to provide effective support.
Yêu cầu công việc: 1.	Education / Professional Certification
•	Preferable degree graduate in IT related field.
2.	Experience
•	Minimum 4 years, working experience in the 1st level IT support environment.
•	Experience with ITSM is an added advantage.
•	Time-management skills and the ability to establish reasonable and attainable deadlines for resolu-tion.
•	Ability to prioritize and manage several milestones and projects efficiently.
•	English speaking / written skill is required: Vital requirement for communication with regional / global support team.
3.	Knowledge / Skills / Other characteristics
•	Independent, self-motivated.
•	Sense of urgency.
•	Ability to communicate with all levels of employee.
•	Good team player.
•	Time flexibility, ability to standby for ad hoc support as and when required.
•	Strong troubleshooting and critical thinking skills

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Java, Network Configuration, Guidewire Framework, Oracle SQL, API
Mô tả công việc: ABOUT THE ROLE/POSITION:

The Guidewire Candidate should have a strong background in software development with a minimum of 3 years web-based Java development experience including at least 2 years in a Guidewire based application. Candidate must have a strong understanding of open systems architecture including configurations with vendor packages, relational databases, message queues, web services.

This role will also provide the necessary software development leadership to the development team and help ensure that the architectural vision is correctly realized during the development and support the team through the release of code to production.
YOUR MISSION:
•	Communicate regularly with the business analyst to interpret, clarify, and plan for the implementation of user stories.
•	Build and suggest technical solution.
•	Providing estimated development times.
•	Develop integration solutions with other systems including Batch Processes, Message Queues and Event Messaging.
•	Managing application configuration and performing minor/major software upgrades.
•	Establish and execute traceable unit and integration tests (automated as to be agreed).
•	Understand and apply industry practices, architectural standards and department policies and procedures relating to work assignments.
•	Review the source code, detailed designs, architecture designs documents.
•	Provide technical support to project teams as needed.
Opportunities
•	Competitive salary, health insurance covered for employee and dependents.
•	Working on international projects. Professional and dynamic working environment.
•	Achieving valuable experience with variety projects, new technologies and hundreds of talents.
•	Receiving training opportunities including many technical seminars and soft skill training courses
•	Good opportunity for promotion through regular performance review system.
•	Health insurance covered for employee and dependents.
Yêu cầu công việc: Must have Technical Requirements / Qualifications:
•	2+ year of Guidewire Integration and Configuration experience in ClaimCenter.
•	Excellent English communication – verbal, written, and presentation skills.
•	Strong GOSU and Java background.
•	P&C Insurance experience as a plus.
•	Guidewire certification preferred, but not required.
•	Ability to work on Guidewire Plug-ins, Messaging, and API.
•	Low level integration designs for Guidewire configurations & integrations.
•	Hands on development experience in Claim/Policy Center projects.
•	Good J2EE based integration skills, JMS, SOA, Web Services.
•	Good skills in Oracle, SQL Server.
•	Strong capabilities in relational databases, message queues, and batch systems.
•	Strong creative problem-solving skills.
Nice to have Technical Requirements / Qualifications:
•	Policy Center.
•	Billing Center.

Develop a Storefront solution
Centralize payment gateways for managing transactions and after payment business (such as: refund, chargebacks, claims, inquiry,..)
Integrate various 3rd services to operate a complete supply-chain system including inventory, catalogs, logistics tracking, and more...
Convert raw data from marketing campaigns, transactions, user behavior, etc. into insights beneficial and significant for business operations.

In addition to development tasks, collaboration with other firm’s CoE is crucial to comprehend issues within their specific sectors. Thus, from a technical standpoint, you will propose solutions to help them improve consistently every day.
* RESPONSIBILITIES
- Participate in Requirements Analysis & Technical Specification in Agile/Scrum development process
- Develop clean, scalable code using .NET Core in Micro-service Architecture & Cloud-native
- Develop backend Data-storage & Data-flows with Postgres, ES, Kafka and various Cloud data toolset
- Test and deploy system (micro-)services & (micro-)apps on AWS EKS/Kubernetes with Docker toolset
- Improve existing system: revising, updating, refactoring and debugging code

+ Document DB modeling & design with Elasticsearch
+ Object Storages with AWS S3
+ Message Queues with KAFKA & Message Queue
+ Messaging with Sendgrid, Twilio, AWS SNS,…
+ Having experience in Cloud Native Computing
+ DevOps, SysOps in AWS and Git CI/CD experience
+ HTML5/CSS3, JS/Typescript, React.js/Vue.js, Node.js
+ English proficiency

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm

Mô tả công việc: As a JAVA Technical Lead, you are responsible for the quality of software developments for a complex application, either in the development or the maintenance phase.
You set standards, give technical directions, and perform reviews to verify the adherence to coding standards.
You work with architecture teams in Europe and Vietnam to understand designs and architecture directions.

As part of the software engineering team, you coach developers, help them to implement the software in line with the designs and standards, and you train them so they become independent on technical aspects.

You are hands-on and able to solve complex technical issues by yourself. You perform code reviews to validate the code written by teammates. You provide recommendations and directions for continuous improvement of the code quality (technical debt reduction, unit tests, coding standards).

You design the technical stack for development projects. Whenever necessary, you research new or emerging technologies and frameworks, give recommendations, build proofs of concept, and conduct trainings.
Yêu cầu công việc: 1. Required
- Extensive experience in the [Tech] technology and ecosystem.
- Extensive knowledge of SQL and database management systems.
- Knowledge of Javascript, HTML, XML, CSS.
- Ability to understand designs documented in mainstream methodologies such as ADD, UML and BPMN.
- Litterate in continuous integration and deployment technologies (Jenkins, Docker)
- Knowledge of clean-code tools such as Sonar.
2. Plus
- Experience and/or certifications on Amazon, Azure and Oracle clouds.
- Experience on IT Operations and live systems (in production).
- Knowledge of the Agile methodology (Scrum).
- Knowledge of other programming languages.
Experience
- At least 8 years experience in [Tech] development, including 2 years as a tech lead.
- Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent
- Able to read and write technical documents in the English language. Oral communication skills in English is not mandatory but is a plus.

DESCRIPTION
1) Project management
- Working with relevant departments to align necessary processes.
- Collaborating with product owner to clarify and align all business requirements.
- Collaborating with IT delivery team to track implementation progress.
- Collaborating with Sourcing team and IT to assess technology providers, and FIN for cost and benefit analysis.
- Detecting project’s barrier and collaborating with other teams for solutions.

2) Product management

3) Manage the stakeholder group

- Open-minded, result-oriented, hard-working, team-work.
- Cooperation, negotiation and decision-making skills.
- Good presentation and leading in meeting.

job_name: Product Manager - Digital Identity & Payment Authentication, AI Fintech
NGÀNH NGHỀ: Quản Lý Dự Án Công Nghệ
LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Product Management, Face recognition, Payment Application
Mô tả công việc: As a Product Manager in Digital Identity & Payment Authentication Product at Trusting Social, you will have the ultimate responsibility for decision-making and prioritization to drive product strategy, roadmap, and development, addressing identity trust in the financial sector in Vietnam and other Trusting Social markets.

You will operate to deliver world-class Digital Identity & Payment Authentication solutions. You will play a key role in ideating and co-creating new features that uniquely meet the needs of Trusting Social's clients & market. You will continue not only enhancing our cutting-edge technologies to prevent the latest fraud trends (deep fake faces, swap faces, transactional frauds, etc.) while assuring the best user experience but also expanding our market-leading solutions region-wise.

If you're genuinely passionate about building world-class Digital Identity & Payment Authentication Products and never settling for second place, join us on a journey of discovery to solve problems and deliver excellence.
What you will do:
- Understand market needs and customers' pain points, stay updated on market trends, create a compelling product vision, and develop a product roadmap quarterly and annually.
- Obsess over customers to deliver the products they need, constantly study the products to understand every aspect and fine-tune them to meet customer needs.
- Deliver a world-class product with inputs from customer/client discovery, sales, and advisory teams.
- Conduct assessments to identify optimal product opportunities, ensuring alignment of features with the targeted market and available technology.
- Work closely with the Data Science team & Engineering team to deliver product features of the product roadmap.
- Engage with clients and users to gather constant feedback and incorporate it into the product features.
- Conceptualize, define, and guide research and product requirements to create exceptional user experiences.
- Use data to understand product and feature performance, and suggest data-driven initiatives to improve the product and user experience.
- Use data and client feedback to identify new fraud schemes. Advise clients with tailored use cases based on data and testing outcomes.
- Provide expert opinions for enhancements/improvements of the product suite provided to clients.
- Collaborate with Data Scientists and Engineers to ensure smooth and proper production implementation.
- Support sales in pitching and deployment for customers.
- Foster the professional growth of product team members by providing ongoing development opportunities and offering timely feedback to enhance their skills and expertise when needed.
Yêu cầu công việc: Must have
- 4+ years of experience in product management along with 7+ years of overall work experience

- Exceptional problem-solving skills (candidates come from internal/external management consulting or similar, or candidates with Technical background - a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field - are strongly welcome. You don't need to write codes, you need to understand the product from technical standpoint only)
- Ability to collect and analyze data from various sources, identify key insights, spot product opportunities, and inform product decisions
- Willingness to roll up your sleeves and do whatever it takes to help your team win
- Ability to maintain a keen attention to detail, multitask, and work well under pressure
- Good interpersonal skills
- Teamwork spirit, hardworking with enthusiastic attitudes
- Strong learning ability and self-motivation to acquire new knowledge
- Capability to zoom in and out on a problem
- Effective problem-solving skills under pressure
Preferred
- Proven track record in Product Management
- Experience with Banking & Financial B2B products, especially payment/ credit transfer solutions.
- Familiarity with common data analysis toolkits, such as SQL
- Knowledge of AI/Machine Learning topics
- Experience in managing KYC process or fraud risk management for customer onboarding

Responsibilities:
•	Lead and mentor a team of support consultants, providing guidance on issue investigation, analysis, and communication.

•	Triage the incoming support ticket queue in Ticketing Tool, ensuring equitable distribution of workload among team members.

•	Act as the go-to person for escalations, collaborating with other engineering teams through the problem management process.

•	Report team status to the Management Team and proactively manage potential escalations.
•	Provide guidance to support team members on Treasury industry standards, including coaching, product training, and onboarding of new team members.

job_name: Embedded Software Engineer (Linux BSP) - Attractive Salary (Upto 80 Millions for Seniors)

Job description: Làm việc như một Kỹ Sư Linux BSP tại VVDN Technologies Vietnam, bạn sẽ đóng một vai trò then chốt trong việc thiết kế, triển khai và tối ưu hóa các giải pháp Linux Board Support Package. Bạn sẽ làm việc chặt chẽ với các đội ngũ đa chức năng để đảm bảo sự tích hợp mượt mà của các công nghệ Linux BSP vào sản phẩm của chúng tôi. Từ ý tưởng đến triển khai, chuyên môn của bạn sẽ đóng góp vào sự thành công của các dự án sáng tạo của chúng tôi.
Trách Nhiệm Công Việc:
- Phát triển và triển khai các giải pháp Linux BSP, đảm bảo hiệu suất và độ tin cậy cao.
- Hợp tác với các đội ngũ phần cứng và phần mềm để tích hợp chức năng Linux BSP vào sản phẩm.
- Tiến hành kiểm thử và khắc phục sự cố chi tiết của các hệ thống Linux BSP.
- Theo dõi xu hướng ngành và công nghệ mới nổi để nâng cao các sản phẩm.
- Cung cấp hỗ trợ kỹ thuật và chuyên môn trong suốt chu kỳ phát triển sản phẩm.

As a Linux BSP Engineer at VVDN Technologies Vietnam, you will play a pivotal role in designing, implementing, and optimizing Linux Board Support Package solutions. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the seamless integration of Linux BSP technologies into our products. From conceptualization to deployment, your expertise will contribute to the success of our innovative projects.
Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement Linux BSP solutions, ensuring high-performance and reliability.
- Collaborate with hardware and software teams to integrate Linux BSP functionality into products.
- Conduct thorough testing and troubleshooting of Linux BSP systems.
- Stay abreast of industry trends and emerging technologies to enhance product offerings.
- Provide technical support and expertise during product development cycles.
Job requirements: - Bằng cử nhân chuyên ngành Kỹ thuật Điện, Khoa học Máy Tính hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan.
- Tối thiểu 4 năm kinh nghiệm trong phát triển Linux BSP.
- Thạo về các giao thức và tiêu chuẩn Linux BSP.
- Có kinh nghiệm thực tế với chipset và phần cứng liên quan đến Linux BSP.
- Kỹ năng lập trình mạnh mẽ bằng các ngôn ngữ như C, C++ hoặc Python.
- Hiểu biết về các giao thức an ninh mạng Linux.
- Sử dụng tiếng Anh thành thạo là bắt buộc.
***Phúc Lợi:
- Mức lương cạnh tranh phù hợp với kinh nghiệm.
- Chương trình chăm sóc sức khỏe và phúc lợi.
- Cơ hội phát triển chuyên nghiệp và đào tạo.
- Môi trường làm việc động đội và hợp tác.
- Tiếp xúc với các dự án và công nghệ hàng đầu.
- Chương trình thưởng và nhận diện nhân sự.

Hãy tham gia VVDN Technologies Vietnam và trở thành một phần của một đội ngũ tương lai coi trọng sự sáng tạo và khuyến khích sự phát triển cá nhân và chuyên nghiệp của bạn. Hãy ứng tuyển ngay để áp dụng chuyên môn của bạn trong một môi trường khuyến khích sự sáng tạo và xuất sắc.

- Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.
- Minimum 4 years of experience in Linux BSP development.

- Hands-on experience with Linux BSP chipsets and related hardware.
- Strong programming skills in languages such as C, C++, or Python.
- Familiarity with Linux network security protocols.
- English Language proficiency is a must.
Benefits:
- Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
- Health and wellness programs.
- Opportunities for professional development and training.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
- Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and projects.
- Employee recognition and rewards programs.

Join VVDN Technologies Vietnam and be a part of a forward-thinking team that values innovation and fosters personal and professional growth. Apply your Linux BSP expertise in an environment that encourages creativity and excellence.

• Hiểu biết sâu rộng về ngành Dược và các quy định liên quan.

Igloo is a full stack insurtech startup that creates innovative B2B2C insurance solutions for platform partners and insurers. - Communication and Teamwork Skills: Flexibility, strong communication skills in both Vietnamese and English, ability to work effectively in a diverse and multinational work environment.
- English: Writing & Speaking

- Read and understand our client’s agreements with their suppliers in English (agreements can be within Emails, Business Contracts, Price Change Forms...)

- University degree in related fields (Finance, Auditing, Economics, Business, Banking...)

- At least 1-year experience in data analytics, retail/wholesale/manufacturing, cost/pricing/promotional/rebates analysis, supplier compliance, accounts payable review, internal auditing, freight/logistics/supply chain…
SKILLS:
- Excellent level of English (especially reading - and verbal communication)
- Detail-oriented, careful manner
- Logical Thinking
- Good analysis skills, love to work with figures/data
- A good team player to effectively work in a dedicated team
- Able to work under high pressure with good change management skills
- Good at MS Office, especially Excel
- Basic knowledge of SQL (preferred by not required)
BENEFITS:
-	Dynamic and professional working environment.
-	13th&14th month salary.
-	Bao Viet Healthcare insurance.
-	100% gross salary in probation
-	100% statutory insurance
-  15+ full-paid annual leave
-  A day off on Christmas day (25th December), plus 1-2 surprising Screen Free Days per year.
*English CV is required

LĨNH VỰC: Ngân hàng
KỸ NĂNG: Network Solutions, Network Architecture, OpenStack, Kubernetes, Java
Mô tả công việc: The Network Solution Architect is expected to provide network consultancy, plan, design, implementation and support to help ACB maximize network availability and functionality to achieve our business goals.

Activities will include in-depth analysis, design (both for high and lower-level network solutions), deployment, support, and consultancy. The role holder needs to be very familiar with Cisco’s intend based networking technologies, including ACI, Software Defined-WAN and Software Defined Access solution. He/She needs to be working in a fast-paced, high-impact environment as a visible contributor delivering ACB’s commitments to our customers.
As the Network Solution Architect, you will be responsible for:
• To interpret and assess the business and technical requirements and identify
suitable solution
• To work with principle vendors, produce architectural network designs for largescale complex networks
• To advise and build simulated networks in test labs to validate the design and solution
• To lead the overall deployment of complex network
• To provide input to estimated cost, timescale, resource skillset requirements with relevant stakeholders, internally and externally
• To provide support and troubleshooting for the network infrastructure related incidents and problems while implementing the project
• To work with the project/program manager and executes all phases of project delivery including plan, design, network staging, implementation, migration, testing, handover, etc
• To provide advice, guidance and expertise to promote adoption of methods and tools and adherence to policies and standards
• To support and promote the development and sharing of specialist knowledge within the organization
Yêu cầu công việc: As the Network Solution Architect, you are expected to have:
• CCIE certifications in Enterprise, Data Centre or Security are highly preferred. Openstack, VCP, RedHat Certification is a plus
• Understanding of Cisco Software Defined Access architecture and solution. Practical experience in design, test, implement of SDA and Wireless solutions
• Understanding of Cisco SD-WAN architecture and solution. Practical experience in design, test, implement of SD-WAN solutions
• Understanding of Data Center architectures, including virtualization, experience in planning, design & implementation of Data Center infrastructure.
• Strong knowledge on DNAC, Wireless, ISE with hands on experience
• Good Knowledge on SDN and NFV based solution, Service Orchestration.
• Rich design and hands on experience on ACI technology with Multi-POD, Multi-Site
• Hands on experience with Nexus Product Family (N9K, N7K, N5K, N2K), and Vxlan, DCI, OTV technologies, as well as Catalyst series switches (2960/3560/3750/4500/6500/6800, etc)
• Familiar with the following technology: STP, HSRP, IGP/EGP routing protocols, MPLS, BGP, high availability, network/device security, netflow, QoS, IP SLA, network management.
• Strong knowledge and experience on Java, Linux, Python, Virtualization, OpenStack, Kubernetes, Container.
• Public / Private Cloud experience and knowledge is a plus
• Excellent communication & interpersonal skills, Effective consulting and communication skills
• Demonstrated industry awareness, especially in finance/banking sector
• Excellent analytical, strategic conceptual thinking, strategic planning and execution skills
You'll Love Working Here
•       Average 15 Montly Base salary per year
•       ACB Health Care.
•       Meal Allowance.
•       Preferential loan as regulated by ACB
•       Yearly Medical Checkup & Team building activities.
•       Professional and Transparent Working Environment
Working location: 444 Cach Mang Thang Tam, W5, D.3, HCM

LĨNH VỰC: Giáo dục/Đào Tạo
KỸ NĂNG: Technical Support, IT System Administration, IT Service, ICT Infrastructure, Information Technology
Mô tả công việc: JOB PURPOSE

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Services Delivery Lead to oversee the delivery of exceptional ICT services and technical support to our internal users. You will be responsible for leading a team of technicians, managing budgets (CAPEX/OPEX), and ensuring the efficient operation of various key functions, including helpdesk support, user training, knowledge base management, service management (ITSM), service level management (SLA/OLA), incident management, and asset management.
AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITIES
- Lead and manage a team of ICT service desk and technical support professionals.
- Develop and implement strategies to ensure efficient and timely resolution of user issues through the helpdesk.
- Design and deliver engaging training programs for end-users on various ICT services and technologies.
- Maintain a comprehensive knowledge base with clear and up-to-date information to empower users and reduce support tickets and on-site support during weekends.
- Implement and manage IT Service Management (ITSM) frameworks and processes to optimize service delivery.
- Establish and maintain Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and Operational Level Agreements (OLAs) with internal stakeholders and third-party vendors.
- Oversee incident management processes, ensuring timely identification, prioritization, and resolution of IT incidents.
- Manage and maintain an accurate inventory of all IT assets, including hardware, software, and licenses.
- Manage the budget for ICT services and technical support, including CAPEX and OPEX.
- Drive cost saving initiatives within ICT by maximizing the use of existing tools, systems, and software licenses.
- Identify opportunities for optimal investment in new technologies and resources to enhance service delivery.
- Lead the development and implementation of user-centric ICT policies that promote responsible use, security, and compliance.
- Continuously monitor and evaluate service delivery performance. Identify areas for improvement and implement changes to enhance efficiency and user satisfaction.
- Collaborate effectively with other ICT teams and departments to ensure smooth service delivery.
Yêu cầu công việc: REQUIREMENTS
- Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a technical support or service delivery leadership role.
- Proven experience in managing and leading a team of technical support professionals.
- In-depth knowledge of IT service management (ITSM) frameworks and methodologies (e.g., ITIL).
- Strong understanding of service level management (SLAs/OLAs) in service delivery.
- Excellent problem-solving, analytical skills, strong communication, and leadership skills.
- Experience with knowledge base management tools, IT asset management tools preferred.
- Experience with IT budgeting and cost management principles preferred.
BENEFITS
-Highly competitive salary package (plus benefits) for Vietnamese and expatriate candidates depending on qualifications/experience;
- 13th month Tet bonus (Vietnamese candidates);
- Annual cost of living adjustment;
- Annual salary increases and bonuses based on performance;
- Recognition & awards programmes;
- 20 days annual leave, plus Xmas closure, public holidays and 5 days paid sick leave;
- Healthcare plan (Private accident, medical, and dental insurance, including annual health checks);
- Education support for staff, spouse and children;
- Relocation allowance to cover visa/flights/initial days accommodation
- Support and assistance in work permit and visa application together with relocation to and settling into living and working in Vietnam;
- Transportation support;
- Business travel insurance;
- Flexible working arrangements;
- Various staff events throughout the year (outings, year-end party, sports activities and other events);
- Onsite fitness and sports centre;
- Opportunity to work within a professional and multicultural environment.

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: IT Phần Mềm, QA Software, IT Quality Control, IT Testing, Software Quality Assurance
Mô tả công việc: Job Description:

We’re looking for a Senior QC/ QA Engineer to join our team. As a Senior QC/ QA Engineer, you will be responsible for cooperation in leading the quality assurance effort for our products. You will be working closely with our development team to ensure that our products meet the highest quality standards. If you are a detail-oriented problem solver with a passion for quality, we want to hear from you!
Responsibilities:

- Testing existing system processes and provide recommendations changes or improvements to existing processes, methods, and technologies that improve product quality, productivity, and customer satisfaction
- The candidate should be able to work independently to identify test cases/test scripts from requirements and map test cases/scripts back to the original requirement
- Understand business objectives and build alignment and buy-in cross-functionally.
- Analyze functional and technical requirements and translate them into manual and/or automatable scenarios.
- Developing and Executing the Cross Browser (browsers like Safari, Chrome, Mobile browsers) testing.
- Perform exploratory testing with a focus on identifying and documenting defects
- Review defects and test logs with QC/QA team to identify root causes and suggest solutions for improving testing, documentation, and process improvement
- Understand product lifecycle concepts and participate in the test planning process
- Provide training to junior engineers
- Join to develop quality assurance standards and processes
Yêu cầu công việc: Skills and Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in engineering or related field
- 5+ years’ proven experience as QC/ QA Engineer in a fast-paced environment
- 5+ years experienced in design test case/ test scenarios and exceptional ability with cross-browser, cross-platform and responsive testing (PC, mobile and tablet)
- Fluent in speaking and written English
- Hands on with various types of testing such as system, functional and regression with web and mobile testing
- Good ability to review testing results with QA /QC team member and ensure quality product as expect
- Highly collaborative internal QC/QA team member with production team who fosters open communication and facilitates mutual understanding and cooperation between all stakeholders
- Demonstrated competence and ability to be self-motivated when analyzing problems
- Be active at work, withstand high pressure
- Ability to develop maintainable test automation solutions using Selenium, Appium or similar technologies.
- Demonstrated knowledge of testing one or more of the following: API interfaces, databases/data stores, analytics
- Experience in Stress testing or performance testing.

LĨNH VỰC: Ngân hàng
KỸ NĂNG: Network Solutions, Network Architecture, OpenStack, Kubernetes, Java
Mô tả công việc: The Network Solution Architect is expected to provide network consultancy, plan, design, implementation and support to help ACB maximize network availability and functionality to achieve our business goals.

Activities will include in-depth analysis, design (both for high and lower-level network solutions), deployment, support, and consultancy. The role holder needs to be very familiar with Cisco’s intend based networking technologies, including ACI, Software Defined-WAN and Software Defined Access solution. He/She needs to be working in a fast-paced, high-impact environment as a visible contributor delivering ACB’s commitments to our customers.
As the Network Solution Architect, you will be responsible for:
• To interpret and assess the business and technical requirements and identify
suitable solution
• To work with principle vendors, produce architectural network designs for largescale complex networks
• To advise and build simulated networks in test labs to validate the design and solution
• To lead the overall deployment of complex network
• To provide input to estimated cost, timescale, resource skillset requirements with relevant stakeholders, internally and externally
• To provide support and troubleshooting for the network infrastructure related incidents and problems while implementing the project
• To work with the project/program manager and executes all phases of project delivery including plan, design, network staging, implementation, migration, testing, handover, etc
• To provide advice, guidance and expertise to promote adoption of methods and tools and adherence to policies and standards
• To support and promote the development and sharing of specialist knowledge within the organization
Yêu cầu công việc: As the Network Solution Architect, you are expected to have:
• CCIE certifications in Enterprise, Data Centre or Security are highly preferred. Openstack, VCP, RedHat Certification is a plus
• Understanding of Cisco Software Defined Access architecture and solution. Practical experience in design, test, implement of SDA and Wireless solutions
• Understanding of Cisco SD-WAN architecture and solution. Practical experience in design, test, implement of SD-WAN solutions
• Understanding of Data Center architectures, including virtualization, experience in planning, design & implementation of Data Center infrastructure.
• Strong knowledge on DNAC, Wireless, ISE with hands on experience
• Good Knowledge on SDN and NFV based solution, Service Orchestration.
• Rich design and hands on experience on ACI technology with Multi-POD, Multi-Site
• Hands on experience with Nexus Product Family (N9K, N7K, N5K, N2K), and Vxlan, DCI, OTV technologies, as well as Catalyst series switches (2960/3560/3750/4500/6500/6800, etc)
• Familiar with the following technology: STP, HSRP, IGP/EGP routing protocols, MPLS, BGP, high availability, network/device security, netflow, QoS, IP SLA, network management.
• Strong knowledge and experience on Java, Linux, Python, Virtualization, OpenStack, Kubernetes, Container.
• Public / Private Cloud experience and knowledge is a plus
• Excellent communication & interpersonal skills, Effective consulting and communication skills
• Demonstrated industry awareness, especially in finance/banking sector
• Excellent analytical, strategic conceptual thinking, strategic planning and execution skills
You'll Love Working Here

job_name: IT Manager (IT Management - Helpdesk - Cyber Security - AI Development)
NGÀNH NGHỀ: Quản Lý Công Nghệ Thông Tin
LĨNH VỰC: Tài Chính
KỸ NĂNG: IT Helpdesk, Cyber Security Analysis, English Verbal Communication, IT Project Management, Agile Scrum
Mô tả công việc: Job description: The IT Manager is tasked with overseeing and managing the organization’s information technology projects. This role involves coordinating with various departments to fulfil the organization’s IT requirements and directing the delivery of networks, development, and disaster recovery systems and processes.
Key Responsibilities:

-	Manage all of Ziku Capital’s information technology and computer systems, including Microsoft 365, Outlook emails, One Drive cloud storage systems, Windows 10+ deployments, Teams, Lastpass, Webflow, Monday.com and M365 Suite including Excel, Word.
-	Plan, organise, control, and evaluate IT and electronic data operations on a monthly/quarterly basis.
-	Lead IT projects, including the design and deployment of new IT systems and services for the benefit of Ziku Capital and third-party clients.
-	Monitor performance of information technology systems to determine cost and productivity levels, and make recommendations for improving the IT infrastructure.
-	Define IT infrastructure strategy, architecture, and processes.
-	Analyse business requirements by partnering with key stakeholders across the Ziku Capital organization to develop solutions for IT needs.
-	Ensure security of data, network access, and backup systems including 2FA, geo blocking and hardware lock down policies.
-	Act in alignment with user needs and system functionality to contribute to organisational policy.
-	Manage IT staff by recruiting, training, and coaching employees, communicating job expectations, and appraising their performance.
-	Audit systems and assess their outcomes. This includes regular system access audits, log reviews, penetration testing and phishing.
-	Preserve assets, information security, and control structures.
-	Handle annual budget and ensure cost-effectiveness.
-	 Adherence to the essential eight framework.
Yêu cầu công việc: General Requirements:
-	Graduated from University majoring in IT, Cybersecurity, Programing, etc.
-	Have at least 1 year of experience in a similar role.
-	Agile, hardworking, eager to learn, with a high sense of responsibility, honesty.
-	Proficient in office skills, Microsoft 365.
-	English skills: writing, reading & understanding, advanced communication skills are required.
-	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
-	Excellent attention to detail and accuracy.
-	Good communication, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills.
-	Strong knowledge of accounting principles, standards, and regulations.
-	Detail-oriented, good time-management, and organizational skills.
-	Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment.
Job Requirements for IT Manager:
-	Proven working experience as an IT Manager or relevant experience.

-	Excellent knowledge of technical management, information analysis, and computer hardware/software systems including Windows 10+, Microsoft 365, Outlook, OneDrive, Teams, LastPass, Webflow, Monday.com, M365 Suite including Excel, Word.
-	Expertise in data centre management and data governance.

-	Hands-on experience with computer networks, network administration, and network installation both physically and remotely. I.e. the installation of new hardware and software on computers remotely and experience in using agents that can control a user computer to get the right outcome.
-	Strong critical thinking and decision-making skills.
-	Excellent project management skills and strong ability to prioritize.
-	Firm grasp on IT infrastructure and operations best practices.
-	A passion for understanding the application/usage of AI broadly and Generative Artificial intelligence (GAI). An understanding of the Microsoft Co-pilot would be very advantageous.
-	 An understanding of the Essential Compliance Framework as it relate to the protection from cyber threats Essential Eight Maturity Model | Cyber.gov.au.
-	  A preparedness to review existing/new systems to assess relevance to the broader Ziku Group strategy of cohesion across the group and outstanding client engagement/service.

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: ReactJS, Next.js, Agile Web Development, Typescript, HTML
Mô tả công việc: The Senior Front-End Web Developer will play a crucial role in developing and enhancing our recruiting software solutions. This position requires a highly skilled individual with a strong background in front-end web technologies and a passion for creating seamless, user-friendly web applications. The ideal candidate will collaborate closely with our Product Development and Product Design teams to rapidly deliver functional and visually appealing websites.
Upon joining the team, your responsibilities will include:
- Design, develop, and maintain high-quality, responsive front-end features for our platform using ReactJS, NextJS, Redux, TypeScript, and HTML.
- Work closely with the Product Development and Product Design teams to understand requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
- Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and optimize websites for maximum speed and scalability.
Implement iterative development practices, continuously delivering improvements and new functionalities.

- Independently research and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in web development and AI technologies, incorporating them into our platform to enhance coding efficiency and product functionality.
- Write clean, scalable, and well-documented code, adhering to best coding practices.
- Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure high performance and reliability across multiple browsers and devices.
Yêu cầu công việc: We are looking for candidates who have:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in front-end web development.
- Strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in ReactJS, NextJS, Redux, TypeScript.
- Proficiency with TailWindCSS, HTML, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap 5, etc is a plus;
- Proven track record of developing responsive web applications and working with cross-functional teams.
- Solid understanding of web design principles and a keen eye for detail.
- Experience with modern development tools and practices, including version control systems (e.g., Git), automated testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently to research and implement new technologies.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills, with a proactive approach to sharing knowledge and contributing to team success.
- Fluency in English is a plus.

hoạch kiểm soát tuân thủ hàng năm về CNTT.

kiểm toán nội bộ/kiểm soát tuân thủ chi tiết về CNTT và hệ thống các biểu mẫu
hồ sơ kiểm toán phục vụ hoạt động kiểm tra.

hoạch kiểm toán nội bộ/kiểm soát tuân thủ đã được phê duyệt/hoặc đột xuất theo
yêu cầu.

nghị cải tiến hệ thống báo cáo CBLĐ xem xét, phê duyệt. Tổ chức họp và thống nhất với đơn vị kiểm toán.

kiểm toán nội bộ được thực hiện khắc phục đầy đủ đúng quy định.

cảnh báo và kiểm soát rủi ro trong hoạt động sản xuất kinh doanh.
-Tư vấn hỗ trợ các phòng ban trong Công ty trong các hoạt động đảm
bảo tuân thủ theo các tiêu chuẩn, quy trình, quy định, giảm thiểu rủi ro.

thủ SOX cho các chủ sở hữu quy trình.

TOEIC 800)

This person will protect our critical systems and assets, build solutions, implement new software and hardware, provide training, and assist in developing the overall IT strategy. From early on, the systems administrator will empower breakthrough innovations, take on challenging assignments, lead initiatives, and be responsible for results. The administrator will also receive world-class training to become a leader in the field. The ideal candidate is passionate about applying skills and expertise to a technology-based business model that creates real-world solutions for the global marketplace.
Objectives of this role
●	Maintain essential IT infrastructure, including operating systems, security tools, applications, servers, email systems, laptops, desktops, software, and hardware
●	Take responsibility for projects and solutions within the larger business initiative
●	Handle business-critical IT tasks and systems that provide commercial advantage in the global marketplace
●	Enable faster and smarter business processes, and develop analytics for meaningful insights
●	Work with internal and external partners to communicate project status, activities, and achievements
Responsibilities

●	Perform server administration tasks (ex: user/group, security permissions, group policies); research event-log warnings and errors; and monitor resources to ensure that systems architecture components work together seamlessly
●	Monitor data-center health using existing management tools, and respond to hardware issues as they arise; help build, test, and maintain new servers when needed

●	Maintain internal infrastructure requirements, including laptop and desktop computers, servers, routers, switches, firewalls, printers, phones, security updates; support internet, intranet, LANs, WANs, and network segments
●	Assist the help desk and other teams with troubleshooting to identify root cause, and provide technical support when needed
●	Perform routine and scheduled audits of all systems, including backups
Yêu cầu công việc: Required skills and qualifications
●	Proven success in an IT role

●	Experience with or knowledge of programming languages and operating systems, current equipment and technologies, enterprise backup and recovery procedures, systems performance-monitoring tools, active directories, virtualization, HTTP traffic, content delivery, and caching
●	Experience in project management, application design and integration, and cloud computing (specifically Microsoft Azure/AWS)
●	Expertise in analyzing and repairing large-scale distributed systems; creating volumes and assigning them to servers; and remote replication
Preferred skills and qualifications
●	Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in information technology or computer science
●	Knowledge of Unix systems administration
●	Familiar with Windows Server Administration work.
●	Professional certification

• Effective communication skills

• Holiday celebrations and parties for team members and family.

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Technical Architecture, Microservices Architecture, Lead Team, Cloud Platform
Mô tả công việc: As an Architecture Practice Head, you are responsible for the overall design and architecture of a large suite of software applications.

•	You work with architecture teams in Europe to develop strategies, standards, roadmaps, and architecture directions.

•	You manage functionally a team of software architects who are responsible for the design of one or several applications and who work with the developers of these applications. You animate the team of architects, explain the global strategy and architecture directions, and coach, help, control, and ensure that each architect gets the design decisions implemented in their application(s).

•	During offer phases, you produce high-level designs and a product breakdown structure that meet the customer's requirements, and you contribute to estimating the size of the development.
•	Whenever necessary, you research new or emerging technologies and frameworks, give recommendations, build proofs of concept, and conduct training.
Yêu cầu công việc: 1. Required

•	Experience in leading a team of 4 to 5 people
2. Plus
•	Experience and/or certifications in Amazon, Azure, and Oracle clouds
•	Knowledge of continuous integration and continuous deployment technologies
Experience
•	At least 10 years of experience in software engineering
•	Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent
•	Good command of the English language

Mô tả công việc: We are an international company headquartered in France, specializing in the supply chain sector. We are in search of a proficient and seasoned Senior AI Engineer to become an integral part of our dynamic team. In the role of an AI Senior Engineer, you will assume a crucial position in the conception, construction, and execution of state-of-the-art artificial intelligence solutions. Collaborating closely with interdisciplinary teams, you will pinpoint business requirements, scrutinize specifications, and devise inventive AI models and algorithms. The ideal candidate will possess a robust expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing.
- AI Solution
+ Formulate, create, and deploy advanced AI models and algorithms to address business challenges.
+ Collaborate with data scientists, software engineers, and domain experts to craft comprehensive end-to-end AI solutions.
- Machine Learning and Deep Learning
+ Stay abreast of the latest developments in machine learning and deep learning technologies.
+ Apply state-of-the-art techniques to enhance existing models and explore innovative approaches.
- Data Processing
+ Handle large datasets, ensuring efficient data preprocessing, feature engineering, and cleaning.
+ Establish data pipelines for smooth integration with AI models.
- Model Evaluation and Optimization
+ Evaluate AI model performance using relevant metrics.
+ Optimize models for scalability, efficiency, and accuracy.
- Research and Development
+ Conduct research to identify emerging trends and technologies in AI.
+ Contribute to the creation of intellectual property, patents, and publications.
- Project Management
+ Lead AI projects from conception to deployment, ensuring adherence to timelines and deliverables.
+ Offer mentorship and guidance to junior team members.
Yêu cầu công việc: - Hold a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a relevant field.
- Demonstrate substantial experience as an AI Engineer, with a specialized focus on machine learning and deep learning.
- Possess a solid comprehension of data structures, algorithms, and statistical concepts.

job_name: ✅ Banking ✅ Scrum Master ✅ Up to NET $3000

Mô tả công việc: We are looking for a Scrum Master/ Agile Coach who demonstrates comprehensive experience in technology, especially in the banking/finance sector.
I. Roles and Responsibilities:
1. Agile coaching/ Scrum master coaches:

● Train and coach teams in self-management & cross-functionality, how to focus on creating high-value increments, how to apply the empirical approach, incremental & iterative development, lean thinking, and Scrum values.
● Train & coach Product Owners with techniques for effective Product Goal definition, Product Backlog management, and release planning that maximize business value.
2. Servant- leader for scrum teams/squads:
● Ensure Scrum events take place positively  & productively within the timebox.
● Facilitate scrum ceremonies (stand-up, sprint planning, sprint review/showcase, sprint retrospective…)

● Work alongside Product Owners to refine and groom the product backlog, forecast sprint iterations, resolve team/stakeholder conflicts and communicate with stakeholders and management to ensure that the team's work is aligned with the overall goals and objectives of the organization.
● Map out execution plans and communicate roles, responsibilities, objectives, commitments, and schedules… for squads.

● Oversee and provide regular status reporting on Scope, Risk, Schedule Management, and Mapping to ensure implementation of approved PRD; Track progress through backlog tracking, burn down metrics, velocity, etc.
● Addresses -  foresee- remove potential or actual impediments and roadblocks that impact the team's ability to deliver the sprint goals.
● Develop a collaborative environment within the team for open dialogue and productive solutions, continual improvement, optimization, innovation, and solving conflicts.
Yêu cầu công việc: ● Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Banking/Finance, Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, or related discipline.
● Authorized Agile mindset and Scrum, Kanban framework with at least 5 - years of experience in equivalent positions (Scrum Master/Agile Coach/PM…) to deliver complex business solutions.
● Experienced in training and coaching Scrum for teams.
● Scrum Master certification (e.g. CSM, PSM, PMI-ACP, CSP-SM)
● Proficient in one or more Agile tools (Confluence, Jira, Slack, Trello, PPM)
● Excellent interpersonal skills and professional skills, ability to simultaneously “see the big picture” and manage the details daily.
● Creative problem-solver, able to prioritize issues and resolve them efficiently with flexibility and responsiveness in handling changing priorities
● Experience and interest in supporting new business initiatives, especially in a banking/finance environment.
● Advanced English in oral and written forms and working with global colleagues and stakeholders.
● Able to travel to work when required.
What do you get?
● Net salary: Up to $3000
● Performance Bonus
● Laptop provided
● Working with world-class talents in a world-class bank

NGÀNH NGHỀ: Bảo Mật Công Nghệ Thông Tin
LĨNH VỰC: Ngân hàng
KỸ NĂNG: Cyber Security Analysis, Architecture Technology, Security Development Lifecycle, Enterprise Architecture, Security Operations
Mô tả công việc: We are looking for Security Architect called Zero Trust Architect.

The Zero Trust Architect will design, develop, and implement the ACB Zero Trust multi-year program, which aims to protect ACB and its customers. The role involves working with stakeholders in ACB and strategic technology partners such as Cisco, Microsoft, Redhat, and others. You are expected to have a strong background in cybersecurity, knowledge of relevant Zero Trust technologies, and experience in designing and implementing security architectures.
As the Zero Trust Architect, you will also be responsible for:
• Maintaining a roadmap for the Zero Trust Architecture implementation.

• Continually assessing the state of the zero trust program against the established roadmap, identifying gaps and shortcomings, and working with other program stakeholders to execute corrective actions.
• Maintaining a roadmap for Zero Trust Architecture implementation.

• Designing and implementing Zero Trust Architecture solutions that are tailored to ACB’s specific needs and future target architecture covering the different Zero Trust pillars and capabilities of the program: identity, device, network, application workload, data, visibility, and analytics, automation, and orchestration and governance.
• Working with vendors to select and implement Zero Trust Architecture solutions.
• Educating and training the ACB staff on Zero Trust Architecture principles and best practices.
• Staying up-to-date on the latest Zero Trust Architecture frameworks, technologies, and trends.

• Engage actively with business and technology stakeholders to enhance and assess ACB’s cyber resilience, including active participation in business continuity and disaster recovery plans and exercises
Yêu cầu công việc: As the Zero Trust Architect, you are expected to have:
• Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in designing and managing large network infrastructure, including software-defined networking.
• Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in different cyber security domains/major vendors: identity, network, endpoint, workload, virtualization, security monitoring, etc.
• Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in the area of automation, including Ansible, Terraform, etc.
• Strong experience in deploying seamless network segmentation projects.
• Strong knowledge and experience in public and private cloud infrastructures: virtualization, containers, Kubernetes, and optionally Serverless.
• Sufficient knowledge and experience in Python.
• Knowledge and experience in applying DevSecOps concepts.
Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
• 8+ years of experience in cybersecurity
• 5+ years of experience in designing and implementing security architectures
• Excellent communication and presentation skills
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team
• Cisco Certified Network Professional (CCNP) Security or Enterprise
You'll Love Working Here
•       Average 15 Montly Base salary per year
•       ACB Health Care.
•       Meal Allowance.
•       Preferential loan as regulated by ACB
•       Yearly Medical Checkup & Team building activities.
•       Professional and Transparent Working Environment
Working location: 444 Cach Mang Thang Tam, W5, D.3, HCM

Mô tả công việc: - Leverage aggregated cyber threat intelligence, log, network flow, and anomaly data for analysis, research, and the identification of potential compromise within infrastructure or applications.
- Identify IT security gaps and provide technical and procedural recommendations that will reduce exposure to cyber-risks.
- Research and recommend new methods and applicable technologies to mitigate risk and protect information assets.
- Research new threats, attacks, and vulnerabilities that may affect IT infrastructure, and ways to identify and protect against them.
- Investigate potential cyber-attacks and intrusion attempts.
- Create detailed security incident reports, including root cause analysis and actions to mitigate such risks in the future.
- Support follow-on actions, such as coordinating with other organization teams to facilitate remediation of the alert/event/incident and close out the investigation.
- Support compliance remediation efforts, impact analysis and documentation.
- Maintain SOX ITGCs ensuring controls are designed and operating effectively.
- Provide risk consultation to requests for contractors, evaluations, and questionnaires.
- Promote security education awareness training to all employees.
- Maintain information security policies, procedures, standards.
- Provide support for day-to-day operational tasks associated with management of an enterprise network environment, including securing, and operating all facets of LAN, WAN, and WLAN services.
- Manage projects to include solution design, development of plans, project schedules, and communication of status updates on project milestones.
- Installing, configuring, and supporting network equipment including routers, switches, firewalls, and access points.
- Investigate solutions to provide continual system improvements and optimization.
- Troubleshoot, diagnose, analyze, and resolve hardware, software, and other network and performance issues.
- Provide support to remote sites, working with site personnel to identify and resolve network related issues.
- Provide on-site support for site changes when additional resources are required.
- Occasional project-based travel and flexibility to work outside of local business hours.
Yêu cầu công việc: Requirements:
- Must be a team player with desire to learn.
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT Security, or equivalent experience required.

- 3+ years’ experience supporting information security analysis and multi-site IP-based network environment participating in design, implementation, maintaining and troubleshooting aspects of the network.
- Strong knowledge of cybersecurity frameworks such as ISO 27001, NIST CSF, CIS, SOX ITGC.
- Strong knowledge of:
- Windows and Linux operating system
- TCP/IP and related Internet and network protocol
- Network architecture and associated devices (routers, switches, WAPs, etc.)
- Next-generation Firewalls, UTM, IPS, IDS, DLP, HIPS, VPN, TLS/SSL, and RAS
- PCAP analysis for troubleshooting and traffic identification
- Working knowledge of SIEM and log management tools.
- Able to work effectively with peers in a team environment, while also working in a self-directed manner on multiple tasks and projects.
- Must be organized, process-minded, and deadline and detail-oriented.
- Demonstrate sound troubleshooting methodologies and strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Must possess good written and verbal communication skills needed to present to all levels of the organization.
- Ability to work with all levels of staff within and outside of IT and outside the organization.
- Ability to think through problems and visualize solutions.
Interpersonal Skills:
- Must be a team player with desire to learn and grow.
- Ability to communicate with others in a team friendly environment.
- Must display ability to work with a team harmoniously.
- Looking for a long-term team player to join our team.
Desired:
- Industry security certifications such as CISSP, CISM, GCIH, GCIA, GPEN.
- Industry network certifications such as CCNA, CCNP, Security+.
- Scripting language experience (i.e., python, expect, etc., for network automation and API integration).
- Ansible experience is a plus.

- Understanding WAN architectures, including Ethernet, site-to-site VPN and packet switching technologies such as MPLS. Use troubleshooting skills to isolate WAN related problems and work with service providers on resolution.
- Experience with wireless LAN hardware, configuration, security, and support aspects within an enterprise environment.
- SD-WAN and SDN experience.

Mô tả công việc: We are looking for a Scrum Master/ Agile Coach who demonstrates comprehensive experience in technology, especially in the banking/finance sector.
I. Roles and Responsibilities:
1. Agile coaching/ Scrum master coaches:

● Train and coach teams in self-management & cross-functionality, how to focus on creating high-value increments, how to apply the empirical approach, incremental & iterative development, lean thinking, and Scrum values.
● Train & coach Product Owners with techniques for effective Product Goal definition, Product Backlog management, and release planning that maximize business value.
2. Servant- leader for scrum teams/squads:
● Ensure Scrum events take place positively  & productively within the timebox.
● Facilitate scrum ceremonies (stand-up, sprint planning, sprint review/showcase, sprint retrospective…)

● Work alongside Product Owners to refine and groom the product backlog, forecast sprint iterations, resolve team/stakeholder conflicts and communicate with stakeholders and management to ensure that the team's work is aligned with the overall goals and objectives of the organization.
● Map out execution plans and communicate roles, responsibilities, objectives, commitments, and schedules… for squads.

● Oversee and provide regular status reporting on Scope, Risk, Schedule Management, and Mapping to ensure implementation of approved PRD; Track progress through backlog tracking, burn down metrics, velocity, etc.
● Addresses -  foresee- remove potential or actual impediments and roadblocks that impact the team's ability to deliver the sprint goals.
● Develop a collaborative environment within the team for open dialogue and productive solutions, continual improvement, optimization, innovation, and solving conflicts.
Yêu cầu công việc: ● Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Banking/Finance, Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, or related discipline.
● Authorized Agile mindset and Scrum, Kanban framework with at least 5 - years of experience in equivalent positions (Scrum Master/Agile Coach/PM…) to deliver complex business solutions.
● Experienced in training and coaching Scrum for teams.
● Scrum Master certification (e.g. CSM, PSM, PMI-ACP, CSP-SM)
● Proficient in one or more Agile tools (Confluence, Jira, Slack, Trello, PPM)
● Excellent interpersonal skills and professional skills, ability to simultaneously “see the big picture” and manage the details daily.
● Creative problem-solver, able to prioritize issues and resolve them efficiently with flexibility and responsiveness in handling changing priorities
● Experience and interest in supporting new business initiatives, especially in a banking/finance environment.
● Advanced English in oral and written forms and working with global colleagues and stakeholders.
● Able to travel to work when required.
What do you get?
● Net salary: Up to $3000
● Performance Bonus
● Laptop provided
● Working with world-class talents in a world-class bank

We offer all that and more at Microchip Technology, Inc.

People come to work at Microchip because we help design the technology that runs the world. They stay because our culture supports their growth and stability. They are challenged and driven by an incredible array of products and solutions with unlimited career potential. Microchip’s nationally-recognized Leadership Passage Programs support career growth where we proudly enroll over a thousand people annually. We take pride in our commitment to employee development, values-based decision making, and strong sense of community, driven by our Vision, Mission, and 11 Guiding Values; we affectionately refer to it as the Aggregate System and it’s won us countless awards for diversity and workplace excellence.

Our company is built by dedicated team players who love to challenge the status quo; we did not achieve record revenue and over 30 years of quarterly profitability without a great team dedicated to empowering innovation. People like you.
Visit our careers page to see what exciting opportunities and company perks await!
Job Description:
• Design and implement custom digital and analog circuits for high speed and ultra-low power SRAM macros.
• Bit cell margin analysis and SRAM design tradeoffs.
• Responsible for working with logic/architecture team to formulate design specifications.
• Define architecture/topologies optimizing for PPA and yield.
• Work with layout team to oversee the design.
• Perform backend and front-end verification.
• Work with product and test engineers for product ramp-up
• Work with FA and yield teams for process and yield improvement
Yêu cầu công việc: • Proven understanding of device physics and process
• Hands-on design experience of SRAM memory circuits and read/write assist circuits.
• Experience with developing and using various flows and methodologies, including: Spice simulation, Static timing analysis, IR / EM analysis
• Experience with High Sigma MonteCarlo tool such as Solido
• Experienced in advanced technology circuit design & layout preferred (28nm/14nm/10nm/7nm).
• Must have good teamwork attitude and good communication skill.
• Experience with SoC architectures, custom design flows and EDA methodologies.
• Experience with scripting languages – Perl, Cshell and Python
• Memory compiler design experience is a plus.
• 7+ years of meaningful industry experience and a background in memory design
• MSEE/PhD preferred

company_name: Công Ty Cổ Phần Tư Vấn Công Nghệ Ngs (Ngsc)
LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: SAP, ABAP, ERP, SAP ERP, SAP CRM
Mô tả công việc: SAP là công ty chuyên cung cấp giải pháp dành cho doanh nghiệp có thị phần lớn nhất trên toàn thế giới. Bản thân SAP sở hữu nhiều giải pháp khác nhau dành cho Doanh Nghiệp, bao gồm không chỉ ERP mà còn nhiều giải pháp then chốt khác như Quản lý Chuỗi Cung Ứng (Supply Chain Management – SCM), Quản lý Quan Hệ Khách Hàng (Customer Relationship Management – CRM), v..v... Tất cả những giải pháp này đã đem lại cho SAP thị phần chiếm tới 23% toàn cầu, cũng là thị phần lớn nhất.
Hiện tại, SAP có hơn 400,000 khách hàng tại 180 quốc gia. Trong đó, ở Việt Nam, SAP có hơn 500 khách hàng doanh nghiệp trải đều ở nhiều ngành nghề khác nhau.
ABAP (Advanced Business Application Programming) là ngôn ngữ lập trình cốt lõi, là nền tảng xây dựng lên khối giải pháp SAP All-in-one như SAP ERP, SAP CRM…

Bạn sẽ có cơ hội được tiếp xúc, đào tạo bài bản và chuyên sâu về ngôn ngữ lập trình ABAP và quy trình triển khai dự án chuyên nghiệp. Ngoài ra, vì sao gọi là ABAP Consultant chứ không phải ABAP Developer, bởi với SAP, mọi vị trí đều cần phải có khả năng tư vấn giải pháp cho khách hàng, dù là ở khía cạnh nghiệp vụ (Functional Consultant) hoặc Kỹ thuật (ví dụ như ABAP Developer hay còn gọi là ABAP Consultant).
===Các công việc của một Fresher ABAP Consultant
- Hoàn thành khóa đào tạo kỹ thuật về ngôn ngữ lập trình ABAP
- Tham gia các dự án của công ty ở vai trò ABAP Consultant (ABAP Developer)
- Thi chứng chỉ SAP ABAP trong vòng 2 năm (chi phí do công ty tài trợ)
- Thực hiện các công việc trong dự án theo phân bổ của Quản lý dự án và Trưởng đội kỹ thuật
- Tuân thủ chặt chẽ các quy trình phát triển sản phẩm chuyên nghiệp
- Tuân thủ chặt chẽ các quy tắc phát triển sản phẩm của SAP
Yêu cầu công việc: - Tốt nghiệp (hoặc sinh viên năm cuối đã hoàn thành chương trình học) Đại Học/Cao đẳng, chuyên ngành liên quan đến IT; ví dụ Software Engineer, Computer Science là lợi thế.
- Có kinh nghiệm lập trình với bấp kỳ ngôn ngữ lập trình nào.
- Kiến thức về SAP và ABAP là lợi thế
- Định hướng muốn phát triển nghề nghiệp theo ngôn ngữ lập trình ABAP
- Sẵn sàng đi công tác trong trường hợp dự án yêu cầu
- Khả năng làm việc độc lập và nghiên cứu tốt
- Khả năng tương tác và làm việc phối hợp nhóm tốt
- Tiếng Anh đọc hiểu tài liệu chuyên ngành
* Lưu ý: Có cam kết về thời gian làm việc sau đào tạo (12 tháng)
===QUYỀN LỢI
- Được đào tạo bài bản về ngôn ngữ lập trình ABAP.
- Được hưởng trợ cấp trong suốt thời gian ĐT và xem xét tăng tăng lương ngay sau khi kết thúc khóa ĐT dựa theo kết quả đánh giá.
- Lương tháng thứ 13, thưởng lễ tết, thưởng hiệu quả kinh doanh theo quy định và theo kết quả kinh doanh
- Cơ hội phát triển nghề nghiệp tốt, ổn định, lâu dài.
- Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo kỹ năng mềm, các chứng chỉ chuyên môn phục vụ cho công việc.
- Xét tăng lương, bậc 1-2 lần/Năm.
- Bảo hiểm sức khỏe PTI Premium và Chương trình Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm chất lượng cao.
- Chế độ nghỉ mát hàng năm.
- Các hoạt động gắn kết khác: party; Team building, Sinh nhật Công ty; CLB Thể thao… Du lịch, team building 2-3 lần/ năm.
- Nhiều chính sách đãi ngộ hấp dẫn khác.
===THÔNG TIN LIÊN HỆ
- Huỳnh Thị Tuyết Nhung (Ms.)
===THÔNG TIN TUYỂN DỤNG
- Tầng 4, tòa nhà 6th Element, Nguyễn Văn Huyên, phường Xuân La, quận Tây Hồ, Hà Nội

You will have the ultimate responsibility for implementing product features that deliver world-class Digital Identity/eKYC. Your role will involve delivering next-generation Digital Identity & Payment Authentication product offerings to our clients and playing a key role in ideating and co-creating new features tailored to Trusting Social's clients and market needs.

If you're genuinely passionate about building world-class Digital Identity & Payment Authentication products and never settling for second place, join us on a journey of discovery to solve problems and deliver excellence.
What you will do
- Understand market needs and customers' pain points, stay updated on market trends, participate in creating a compelling product vision, and develop a product roadmap quarterly and annually.
- Obsess over customers to deliver the products they need, constantly study the products to understand every aspect and fine-tune them to meet customer needs.
- Proactively engage in the end-to-end product cycle of research, development, testing, deployment, and improvement.
- Engage with clients and users to gather constant feedback and incorporate it into the product features.
- Use data to understand product and feature performance, and suggest data-driven initiatives to improve the product and user experience.
- Collaborate closely with Data Scientists and Product Managers to build a data-informed product roadmap.
- Use data and client feedback to identify new fraud schemes. Advise clients with tailored use cases based on data and testing outcomes.
- Provide expert opinions for enhancements/improvements of the product suite provided to clients.
- Collaborate with Data Scientists and Engineers to ensure smooth and proper production implementation.
- Manage data collection for product performance tracking and improvement.
- Support sales in pitching and deployment for customers.

- Effective problem-solving skills under pressure
Preferred

- Experience with Banking & Financial B2B products, especially payment/ credit transfer solutions.
- Familiarity with common data analysis toolkits, such as SQL
- Knowledge of AI/Machine Learning topics
- Experience in managing KYC process or fraud risk management for customer onboarding
