Mô tả công việc: *PRIMARY PURPOSE: The IT Support is responsible for providing support to Profectus staff relating to hardware, applications, troubleshooting computer problems and determining reason, and advice on appropriate action. He/she will manage the server, computer, laptop, printer, and other office equipment.
•	Answer staff’s questions in person and via phone/email…
•	Troubleshoot computer, printer, and network, problems.
•	Determine the source of problems (hardware, software, user access, etc.).
•	Advise staff on appropriate action.
•	Serve as liaison between staff and the department to resolve issues.
•	Troubleshoot and resolve hardware, software, and connectivity problems, including user access and component configuration.
•	Record, and maintain hardware and software inventories, site and/or server licensing, and user access and security.
•	Install, configure, and upgrade desktop hardware and peripherals to include network cards, printers, computer mouse, etc.
•	Work as a team member with other technical staff, such as network, system, and applications to ensure connectivity and compatibility between systems.
•	Conduct technical research on system upgrades to determine feasibility, cost, time required, and compatibility with the current system.
•	Maintain confidentiality about the information being processed, stored, or accessed by the network.
•	Document system problems and resolutions for future reference.
•	Maintain the adherence to ISO27001 standards, conduct security awareness training for staff, promoting a security-conscious culture within the organization.
Yêu cầu công việc: *REQUIREMENTS
•	College or bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or computer information systems.
•	At least 03 years’ experience working in IT Support and helpdesk.
•	Intermediate English skills in communicating by speaking, writing, listening, and reading.
•	Advanced knowledge of company-supported applications, and databases. Ability to learn and support new applications.
•	Ability to plan, implement, test, and troubleshoot system software.
•	Ability to determine computer problems and coordinate hardware and/or software solutions.
•	Ability to communicate technical guidance and instruction to users on the use of PCs, server applications, and systems.
•	Experience with Microsoft 365 suite, firewalls, VPN and securities protocols
•	Knowledge of best practices in user access control, including least privilege principle, role-based access control (RBAC), and multifactor authentication (MFA).
•	Experience with patch management processes and tools to ensure that software and systems are up-to-date with the latest security patches.
•	Experience with JIRA, MS Azure and Active Directory is a big advantage.
•	Experience or knowledge on intrusion detection systems (IDS), intrusion prevention systems (IPS) and other security tools is a big advantage.
*BENEFITS:
•	Dynamic and professional working environment

company_name: Công Ty TNHH Money Forward Việt Nam

This role involves close collaboration with our Japanese team and driving the product toward sustained success over the next three years and beyond. This position offers visibility to senior management in both Vietnam and Japan and represents a significant opportunity for career development as a senior manager in engineering.

KỸ NĂNG: React, Website Development, ReactJS, Japanese, Node.js
Mô tả công việc: Công ty TNHH GMO-Z.com Financial System VN là công ty con của tập đoàn GMO Financial Holdings, Inc., một doanh nghiệp hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực công nghệ, tài chính tại Nhật Bản và là một thành viên trong tập đoàn GMO Group.  Công ty đang cần tuyển vị trí như sau:
NỘI DUNG CÔNG VIỆC
• Tham gia cùng với các kỹ sư bên Nhật, vận hành và phát triển các product, dịch vụ của công ty.
• Trao đổi với các phòng ban Marketing, Design hoặc PM của dự án để nắm được yêu cầu và triển khai.
• Sang công ty mẹ bên Nhật công tác hoặc sang làm lâu dài khi có yêu cầu từ công ty.
• Review code, hỗ trợ các member khác khi được yêu cầu.
• Tìm tòi, phát kiến ý tưởng, giải pháp cải thiện, cải tiến quy trình, nâng cao hiệu suất công việc và tính năng cho sản phẩm.

Về mặt kỹ thuật, chúng tôi chủ yếu sử dụng React, nhưng cũng có dự án sử dụng Vue và Angular. GMO Financial HD là công ty mẹ liên quan đến nhiều dự án khác nhau do có mối quan hệ với các công ty con, nên có nhiều cơ hội tham gia vào việc triển khai dự án mới. Khi triển khai dự án mới, chúng tôi lựa chọn các công nghệ hiện đại để kỹ sư có thể phát triển và học hỏi! Chúng tôi rất hoan nghênh những thành viên có khả năng chọn lựa công nghệ phù hợp với thời đại và công nghệ Frontend đang thay đổi nhanh chóng với độ nhạy bén và khả năng nhận biết thông tin. Ngoài ra, gần đây, việc xem xét các lĩnh vực liên quan đến Server Side Rendering (SSR), Backends For Frontends (BFF) cũng trở thành điều quan trọng. Trong thực tế, khi triển khai dự án GMO Office Support (dịch vụ văn phòng ảo), đội Frontend đã đảm nhận cả phần Server Side (Node.js) và Infra (AWS). Chúng tôi đã lần đầu tiên triển khai sử dụng các công nghệ như "Serverless" và "GraphQL" và đóng góp vào việc nâng cao khả năng kỹ thuật nội bộ. Chúng tôi hoan nghênh các ứng viên không chỉ muốn làm Kỹ sư Frontend mà còn muốn hoạt động như Kỹ sư Full Stack!
Yêu cầu công việc: KỸ NĂNG CẦN THIẾT

HOAN NGHÊNH CÁC BẠN CÓ THÊM NHỮNG KHẢ NĂNG SAU:

QUYỀN LỢI:

In this role, you will play a pivotal role in developing and managing our global e-commerce platform and other critical application systems. You will be responsible for leading projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered with the highest quality standards.

- Participate in system integration (SI) projects to develop and manage application systems, acting as a Project Manager (PM) and overseeing developers.
- Serve as the ITO PM for the operation of Amorepacific Global E-commerce Malls (such as Innisfree in Malaysia, Laneige and Amorepacific in Hong Kong and Taiwan)

Yêu cầu công việc: I. Experience:

- Proven track record in developing and managing systems based on Magento, Java & Spring Framework.
- Demonstrated experience in successfully building and operating e-commerce websites and CRM systems.
- Global proficiency and exposure in project management.
- Proficiency in effectively managing customer relationships and human resources within project teams.
II. Skills / Knowledge:
- Fluent in business English and Korean with effective communication skills to communicate directly with customers (mandatory).
- Proficiency in Java, JavaScript, HTML5, and proficiency with various open-source technologies.
- Strong command of database management systems including MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and other open-source databases.
- Extensive experience in designing, implementing, and utilizing Open APIs.

- Excellent customer management skills, including handling key customer interactions, listening to and addressing their feedback (VOC), analyzing and supporting received tasks, and proposing and discovering new business opportunities.
- Strong human resource management skills, including team building, conflict resolution, and performance evaluation.
- Strong issue-resolution skills, with the ability to identify and address challenges promptly and effectively.
- Demonstrated proficiency in quality management, ensuring that projects adhere to high standards and meet client requirements.
III. Why you'll love working here
1.   Salary and Benefit
- Attractive salary and benefit (Competitive Basic Salary; 13th Salary; Lunch, Gasoline and Telephone allowance; Incentive Bonus) and annual salary review
- Premium Healthcare for you, 100% covered by the company. Annual medical checking (up to USD5,000 per year)
- Full-fill package: Full government social, health and unemployment insurance
- Extra bonus per personal events (Wedding, Funeral, Birthday, Newborn baby)
- Paid leave (12 days per year) and 01 day for Company Foundation Day
- Paid over time according to Labor Law
- Discount 40% for CJ's brands (CGV Cinema, Tous Les Jours, CJ Food, Meet Master, CJ Market, etc.).
2.  Working Environment
- Working time: Monday – Friday. We work 40 hours per week
- English working environment: Chance to work onsite abroad and work on challenging GDC projects. Work closely with both Vietnamese and Korean experts
- Internal English/ Korean Class: Fully sponsored by the Company after working time

- Free snacks, drinks (tea, coffee, etc.)

hiện;

LĨNH VỰC: Giáo dục/Đào Tạo
KỸ NĂNG: Computer Science, IT Security, IT Risk Management, Security, An Ninh Thông Tin
Mô tả công việc: PURPOSE.
• Oversee all the information security operation in VAS.
• Minimize the business risk which might be caused by Technology based Solution.
• Ensure the VAS information shall be protected in term of availability, integrity & confidentiality matching with business need and support the VAS growth.
• Enhance the Security Awareness among VAS community.
Job Description
• Establish the Information Security Plan toward to updated ISO Framework as well as in alignment with IT Strategic Plan,
• Write & review all security-related documents such as incidents reports, proposals and tactical or strategic initiatives.
• Implement the security policies, regulations and rules, norm and make sure that the environment, in VAS is safe.
• Play the role of Project Manager to undertake all the projects to mitigate the business risk in term of Information Security.

• Undertake the periodical Internal Audit to ensure setting up the controls in Technology based Solution following to Risk Reports & Mitigation Plan. Lead the penetration test to identify the technical vulnerabilities of IT Platform & work with relevant teams to propose the solution to management.
• Frequently hold the meeting with Management Team to present the business technology related risks and mitigation plan.
• Work as representative of IT Division & collaborate with external Audit companies for Annual Internal Audit.
• Undertake the data classification & ensure the VAS Information shall be protected in term of confidentiality, availability, and Integrity.

• Manage the day to day of entire Information Security Team Activities & show up the leadership role in collaborating with business Divisions Head to identify the business risk based on the IT solution.

Looking for an atmosphere of trust, empowerment, respect, diversity, and communication? How about an opportunity to own a piece of a multi-billion dollar (with a B!) global organization? We offer all that and more at Microchip Technology, Inc.

People come to work at Microchip because we help design the technology that runs the world. They stay because our culture supports their growth and stability. They are challenged and driven by an incredible array of products and solutions with unlimited career potential. Microchip’s nationally-recognized Leadership Passage Programs support career growth where we proudly enroll over a thousand people annually. We take pride in our commitment to employee development, values-based decision making, and strong sense of community, driven by our Vision, Mission, and 11 Guiding Values; we affectionately refer to it as the Aggregate System and it’s won us countless awards for diversity and workplace excellence.

Our company is built by dedicated team players who love to challenge the status quo; we did not achieve record revenue and over 30 years of quarterly profitability without a great team dedicated to empowering innovation. People like you.
Visit our careers page to see what exciting opportunities and company perks await!

- No restriction to any country with Microchip’s presence.

NGÀNH NGHỀ: Bảo Mật Công Nghệ Thông Tin
LĨNH VỰC: Ngân hàng
KỸ NĂNG: Cyber Security Analysis, Architecture Technology, Security Development Lifecycle, Enterprise Architecture, Security Operations
Mô tả công việc: We are looking for Security Architect called Zero Trust Architect.

The Zero Trust Architect will design, develop, and implement the ACB Zero Trust multi-year program, which aims to protect ACB and its customers. The role involves working with stakeholders in ACB and strategic technology partners such as Cisco, Microsoft, Redhat, and others. You are expected to have a strong background in cybersecurity, knowledge of relevant Zero Trust technologies, and experience in designing and implementing security architectures.
As the Zero Trust Architect, you will also be responsible for:
• Maintaining a roadmap for the Zero Trust Architecture implementation.

• Continually assessing the state of the zero trust program against the established roadmap, identifying gaps and shortcomings, and working with other program stakeholders to execute corrective actions.
• Maintaining a roadmap for Zero Trust Architecture implementation.

• Designing and implementing Zero Trust Architecture solutions that are tailored to ACB’s specific needs and future target architecture covering the different Zero Trust pillars and capabilities of the program: identity, device, network, application workload, data, visibility, and analytics, automation, and orchestration and governance.
• Working with vendors to select and implement Zero Trust Architecture solutions.
• Educating and training the ACB staff on Zero Trust Architecture principles and best practices.
• Staying up-to-date on the latest Zero Trust Architecture frameworks, technologies, and trends.

• Engage actively with business and technology stakeholders to enhance and assess ACB’s cyber resilience, including active participation in business continuity and disaster recovery plans and exercises
Yêu cầu công việc: As the Zero Trust Architect, you are expected to have:
• Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in designing and managing large network infrastructure, including software-defined networking.
• Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in different cyber security domains/major vendors: identity, network, endpoint, workload, virtualization, security monitoring, etc.
• Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in the area of automation, including Ansible, Terraform, etc.
• Strong experience in deploying seamless network segmentation projects.
• Strong knowledge and experience in public and private cloud infrastructures: virtualization, containers, Kubernetes, and optionally Serverless.
• Sufficient knowledge and experience in Python.
• Knowledge and experience in applying DevSecOps concepts.
Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
• 8+ years of experience in cybersecurity
• 5+ years of experience in designing and implementing security architectures
• Excellent communication and presentation skills
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team
• Cisco Certified Network Professional (CCNP) Security or Enterprise
You'll Love Working Here
•       Average 15 Montly Base salary per year
•       ACB Health Care.
•       Meal Allowance.
•       Preferential loan as regulated by ACB
•       Yearly Medical Checkup & Team building activities.
•       Professional and Transparent Working Environment
Working location: 444 Cach Mang Thang Tam, W5, D.3, HCM

job_name: Senior Product Development Specialist - Digital Identity & Payment Authentication, AI Fintech
NGÀNH NGHỀ: Quản Lý Dự Án Công Nghệ
LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Face recognition, Product Development, B2B Business
Mô tả công việc: As a Senior Product Development Specialist in Digital Identity & Payment Authentication Product at Trusting Social, you will participate in decision-making and prioritization to drive product strategy, roadmap, and development, addressing identity trust in the financial sector in Vietnam and other Trusting Social markets. You will have the ultimate responsibility for implementing product features that deliver world-class Digital Identity/eKYC. Your role will involve delivering next-generation Digital Identity & Payment Authentication product offerings to our clients and playing a key role in ideating and co-creating new features tailored to Trusting Social's clients and market needs.

If you're genuinely passionate about building world-class Digital Identity & Payment Authentication products and never settling for second place, join us on a journey of discovery to solve problems and deliver excellence.
What you will do
- Understand market needs and customers' pain points, stay updated on market trends, participate in creating a compelling product vision, and develop a product roadmap quarterly and annually.
- Obsess over customers to deliver the products they need, constantly study the products to understand every aspect and fine-tune them to meet customer needs.
- Proactively engage in the end-to-end product cycle of research, development, testing, deployment, and improvement.
- Engage with clients and users to gather constant feedback and incorporate it into the product features.
- Use data to understand product and feature performance, and suggest data-driven initiatives to improve the product and user experience.
- Collaborate closely with Data Scientists and Product Managers to build a data-informed product roadmap.
- Use data and client feedback to identify new fraud schemes. Advise clients with tailored use cases based on data and testing outcomes.
- Provide expert opinions for enhancements/improvements of the product suite provided to clients.
- Collaborate with Data Scientists and Engineers to ensure smooth and proper production implementation.
- Manage data collection for product performance tracking and improvement.
- Support sales in pitching and deployment for customers.
Yêu cầu công việc: Minimum
- Good command of Vietnamese
- 3+ years of experience in product management along with 5+ years of overall work experience
- Technical background with a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
- Ability to collect and analyze data from various sources, identify key insights, spot product opportunities, and inform product decisions
- Willingness to roll up your sleeves and do whatever it takes to help your team win
- Ability to maintain a keen attention to detail, multitask, and work well under pressure
- Good interpersonal skills
- Teamwork spirit, hardworking with enthusiastic attitudes
- Strong learning ability and self-motivation to acquire new knowledge
- Capability to zoom in and out on a problem
- Effective problem-solving skills under pressure
Preferred
- Proven track record in Product Management
- Experience with Banking & Financial B2B products, especially payment/ credit transfer solutions.
- Familiarity with common data analysis toolkits, such as SQL
- Knowledge of AI/Machine Learning topics
- Experience in managing KYC process or fraud risk management for customer onboarding

- Good communication skill in English, mostly for the technical communication with the collaborating scrum teams

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Linux System Administration, Cloud, Agile, DevOps, Script Language
Mô tả công việc: Job Title: System Engineer

SkyLab is a cloud service company revolutionizing the way data, content, applications and workloads are managed across the hybrid cloud environment. SkyLab’s innovative Cloud Service Platform, FusionFlow™, empowers our clients and partners to launch and scale secure applications and services globally by introducing a single unified application runtime environment.

We’re seeking a highly skilled System Engineer who has the technical expertise to implement strategies, evaluate products, and build upon an infrastructure that supports the changing needs of our clients and partners. In this role, the System Engineer will be responsible for planning, designing, implementing, and maintaining new and existing systems and infrastructure. The ideal candidate will be able to reliably deliver mission-critical infrastructure with an eye toward accessibility, monitoring, optimization, and security.
Responsibilities:
- Design and configure Linux operating systems in both physical and virtualized environments.
- Collaborate with development teams to provide necessary resources and support.
- Develop and maintain automation scripts using Python, Chef, and Ansible to streamline server and storage administration tasks.
- Continuously monitor, optimize, and improve system performance, capacity, and availability.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure high-level service delivery and performance.
- Create and maintain comprehensive documentation related to deployments.
- Assist in the development and execution of disaster recovery and business continuity plans.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and advancements in Linux and network technologies.
- Formulate packages for software distribution and patching.
- Lead testing practices to ensure software updates do not negatively impact key business applications or user experience.
- Participate in an on-call rotation periodically, providing out-of-hours support as needed.
Yêu cầu công việc: Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience in Linux system administration and distributions, including RedHat, CentOS, Debian, etc.
- 3 to 5 years of scripting experience with Python, Ruby, Perl, or other automation tools.
- Knowledged with Cloud technologies and Public cloud such as Red Hat, SuSE, OpenShift, AWS, Mesos, Azure/Azure Pack.
- Experience for setup Hardware, Switch, System Infra and  Virtualization ( VMware, Proxmox)
- Knowledge of networking, virtualization, and storage technologies.
- Solid understanding of protocols such as DNS, HTTP, LDAP, SMTP, and SNMP.
- Experience in SAN, NAS, Storage operations, backup operations, and virtualization software.
- Additional Linux certifications (RHCT, RHCE, and LPIC) will be considered an advantage.
- Working in Agile, DevOps practices, and ITIL processes will be considered an advantage.
- Experience installing, configuring, and maintaining services such as Bind, Apache, MySQL, nginx, etc.
- Strong grasp of configuration management tools, including Puppet, Chef, and Ansible.
- Familiarity with best practices and techniques to maintain and enhance information security.
- Expertise in complex software configuration for common and specialized software.
- Experience in monitoring End User Computing operations and providing metrics.
- Tech-savvy with a passion for learning new technology and tools.
- Customer-focused with excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to communicate effectively at all levels within the organization.
- Strong prioritization, organizational, and time-management skills.
- Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
- Strong commitment to continuous learning and professional development.
- Willingness to travel for the new deployment of systems in the other countries

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm

Mô tả công việc: Job Description: We are seeking a motivated and capable Junior Backend Developer to join our team. As a Junior Backend Developer, you will be instrumental in crafting and maintaining the server-side logic for our web applications. You will work closely with our development team to ensure seamless integration between the frontend and backend components, leveraging technologies such as Node.js, TypeScript, Go, and cloud computing services like AWS to build robust and scalable solutions.
Responsibilities:
• Collaborate with the development team to architect and implement server-side logic for web applications.
• Develop efficient and scalable backend systems using Node.js, TypeScript, and Go.
• Implement RESTful APIs to facilitate communication between frontend and backend components.
• Integrate cloud computing services, particularly AWS, to deploy and manage backend infrastructure.
• Ensure data security, integrity, and reliability in backend systems.
• Work alongside frontend developers to ensure smooth integration and optimal user experience.
• Conduct thorough testing of backend functionality, identifying and resolving any
issues or bugs.
• Participate in code reviews, offering constructive feedback to maintain code quality and adherence to best practices.
• Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends in backend development.
• Collaborate with UX designers and frontend developers to deliver cohesive and intuitive web applications
Yêu cầu công việc: ***Job Requirements:
• Proficiency in backend technologies such as Node.js, TypeScript, and Go.
• Familiarity with RESTful API design and implementation.
• Basic understanding of cloud computing platforms, particularly AWS.
• Knowledge of database systems such as MySQL, MongoDB, or PostgreSQL.
• Solid understanding of version control systems, preferably Git.
• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
• Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
• Proactive attitude with a strong sense of responsibility and dedication to learning.
• English communication skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing).
• Experience with cloud computing platforms like AWS is a plus.
• Knowledge of frontend technologies (e.g., React.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is advantageous.
• Previous experience with PHP and MySQL is a bonus.
***Salary & Benefits: We offer a competitive base salary in line with the Ho Chi Minh City labor market, with additional performance-based incentives and bonuses. Our benefits package includes:
• Annual profit-linked bonus
• Social insurance and UIC healthcare coverage for employees and their families
• State-of-the-art office environment with high-end workstations
• Free parking
• Modern and enjoyable workplace with complimentary snacks, coffee, and tea

We value and recognize the contributions and achievements of our employees, both in business and non-business activities, and offer various awards and incentives to acknowledge their dedication and excellence.

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Information Technology, Penetration Testing, DevOps, Security Information, An Toàn Thông Tin
Mô tả công việc: ABOUT THE JOB

Security is one of the fastest growing segment in the IT Industry, covering a wide range of roles that work together to protect users from theft, damage, loss, and unauthorized access to their computers, network, and data.

StarCamp is NAB Vietnam’s intensive boot camp designed for tech-majored students who are looking to start a career in technology; as well as career-switchers who are looking to change their career path towards technology.
NAB Vietnam is now opening a Security focus StarCamp program for freshers in the IT industry.

Our bootcamp will provide you with core competencies, the skills, and the mindset required to be part of an elite team that provide cybersecurity to more than 10 million customers globally, including:
- Learning how NAB build processes, features, and infrastructure to protect our 10-million customers.
- Training allowance for 3 months and opportunity to become official employees after training
- Developing soft skills and English skills required for international software development workplace
Including both:
1. Technical-focused roles such as Pen-testing engineers and DevOps
2. Analytical-focused roles such as Business Analyst and Data Analyst
WHY SECURITY?

Cybercrime and financial crime are on the rise, with it a strong demand for security professionals (32% increase globally between 2022 and 2023). NAB in particular has invested heavily in security, both in terms of infrastructure and our workforce, to protect our customers. We also aim to invest in the tech ecosystem in Vietnam, leveraging our expertise to grow a sustainable generation of talents in cybersecurity here.
Also, join us if you want to:
- Help protect millions of users from theft, damage, and loss
- Work in an international software development environment
Yêu cầu công việc: We are looking for some great new talent to join us who can say yes to being:
1.	Analytical Problem Solvers
2.	Collaborative Team Players
3.	Outside the box Innovators
4.	Accountable deliverers
5.	Proactive and Eager Learners

LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: TensorFlow, Computer Science, Application Development, Product Development, Pipeline Development
Mô tả công việc: What you need to do:

- Lead and deliver AI solutions for Dayone, including (but not limited to): maximizing Got It voucher’s revenue (e.g. intelligent voucher redemption recommendation system), online shopping recommendation systems, AI-assisted productivity boosting applications, and OCR system for invoices and business documents.

- Work with large and real world data from our products (Got It, Buzz It, Scan It, and internal tools) to generate insightful information, assist business decisions, and maximize business value of our products.
- Develop tools and frameworks to help training, deploying, and monitoring AI models more generic and effective.
- Organize AI team to optimize resources yet deliver high quality services.
- Collaborate with other teams to assure the service operations meet expectations from internal and external users.
- Perform additional duties as required by Line Manager.
Yêu cầu công việc: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field or 3+ years of equivalent experience.
- At least 4 + years of experience in AI or relevant positions.
- Have 2 + year of team leader experience or relevant positions.
- Knowledge of the following areas (but not limited to): Recommendation system, - Computer Vision, NLP (information extraction), Large Language Models, OCR pipeline.
- Knowledge of AI frameworks: Pytorch, Tensorflow, Triton, TF serving.
- Experience in writing API to wrap AI models.
- Ability to plan & organize AI services, especially in emergency situations.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Be proactive, enthusiastic, hard-working.
- Be integrity, careful, accurate.
*** What we offer
- Working time from Monday to Friday (09:00 am - 18:00 pm).
- Good chance to study and develop career path stably with internal promotion and rotation.
- 100% statutory insurance contribution as per the labor law.
- Bao Viet Healthcare insurance.
- 100% gross salary in probation.
- 12 Annual Leave (AL) per year + extra 1 AL per extra working year.
- Annual bonus: depending on business & individual performance.
- Annual salary review.
- ESOP allows you to financially share in our future success.
- Other rewards: 5-star, employee of the month (EOTM), employee of the year (EOTY), loyalty employee (3-year, 5-year, 8-year, etc.)
- Internal Activities: General Meeting, Company Trip, International Women's Day,
Vietnamese Women's Day Mid-Autumn Festival, Family Day, Christmas, Year-end Party, etc.

job_name: Software Support Engineer – Microsoft CRM & ERP
LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Giải Pháp Kỹ Thuật, CRM Platform, ERP Support, Technical Support, Dynamics 365
Mô tả công việc: Tek Experts là sự kết hợp hoàn hảo giữa con người và công nghệ. Tek Experts cung cấp dịch vụ IT Outsourcing đồng thời hỗ trợ các tập đoàn trên thế giới trong các khâu thiết yếu của hoạt động kinh doanh.

Là đối tác chính thức của Microsoft tại Việt Nam, Tek Experts đang tìm kiếm Technical Support Engineer - Kỹ sư Hỗ trợ Phần mềm cho các sản phẩm Microsoft Dynamics. Bạn sẽ có cơ hội phát triển trong một môi trường có nhịp độ công việc nhanh và đầy thách thức, nơi mọi người đều được trao quyền và cam kết mang lại trải nghiệm khách hàng tốt nhất.
Đến với Tek Experts, các bạn sẽ có cơ hội tiếp cận, học hỏi và làm chủ các công nghệ hàng đầu như: Dynamics CE/CRM, Azure, Windows Server, SQL,...
Tại vị trí này:

- Bạn sẽ đóng vai trò là đầu mối kỹ thuật chính, cung cấp các giải pháp hỗ trợ các khách hàng doanh nghiệp và đối tác nước ngoài, nhằm khắc phục sự cố kỹ thuật liên quan tới các sản phẩm phần mềm của Microsoft Dynamics CRM và Dynamics ERP
- Phối hợp với các chuyên gia chủ đề và trưởng nhóm kỹ thuật khi cần
- Duy trì tài liệu của các case bao gồm các các bước quy trình và các giải pháp
Yêu cầu công việc: Bạn sẽ là ứng cử viên sáng giá cho vị trí này nếu:
- Bạn có khả năng giao tiếp tiếng Anh tốt
- Bạn là người học hỏi nhanh, sáng tạo, có kỹ năng phân tích, xử lý tình huống
- Đã được tiếp xúc với Dynamics 365 Operations, Dynamics ERP, Dynamics CRM, Microsoft Power Apps & Flows là một lợi thế
Tek Experts sẽ offer bạn job FULL TIME với mức lương HẤP DẪN, cùng với:
1. Lương, thưởng, bảo hiểm:
- Được nhận 100% lương trong thời gian On Job Training
- Được đóng bảo hiểm trên 100% lương
- Được nhận Performance bonus/KPI bonus hàng quý và cuối năm
- Bảo hiểm sức khỏe PTI (hiện tại điều trị ngoại trú lên tới 15 triệu/năm, nội trú lên tới 100 triệu/năm)
- Được health check 1 năm/lần tại các bệnh viện lớn
2. Các chương trình đào tạo và phát triển:
- Được native English instructor (từng giảng dạy tại British University Vietnam, ĐH Hà Nội, ĐH Quốc Gia HN, Language Link Vietnam...) song hành giảng dạy
- Được tham gia rất nhiều khóa đào tạo kĩ năng mềm bổ ích: Cultivate Your Leadership Program, Unleash Your Potential Program...
- Có cơ hội được offer cross-business-line, internal transfer/promotion
3. Các hoạt động nội bộ:

- Được tham gia cực nhiều hoạt động nội bộ thú vị: Ngày hội Book Exchange, Tek Experts Uprace - Run for Community, Tek Expert Summer Trip, Giải bóng đá Tek League, Tek Experts Table Tennis Tournament, Tek Experts X-Factor, Tek Experts Family Day, Tek Experts Fashion Show, Tek Experts Eco Day, Tek Experts Dance Contest...

Mô tả công việc: * Development of backend systems (web service APIs: Rest APIs or SOAP APIs, chat system, web applications such as
Java/JSP) with following responsibilities:
• Requirement development: ensure the requirement of system/project is enough clear and they are transferred to all members of team/project via Scrum planning or meetings.
• Design phase: knowledge of database design, system design and the architecture of the system.
- Review/feedback sequence diagrams for other members’ tasks (if need).
- Understand and follow/feedback database design, architecture design, framework/libraries of projects.
• Coding (CD) phase:
- 50% - 80% effort for coding + fix bug + code review (similar responsibility as senior backend engineer).
• Unit Test (UT) phase.
- Ensure that members apply unit testing framework/library (JUnit, Mockito, TestNG, ….) if the customer requests or the quality of project is high.
- Ensure the testing coverage (%) as requested.
• Integration Test (IT): ensure that the whole system (modules, 3rd party) is integrated as the functional requirement.
• Project Management:
- Plan multiple projects simultaneously.
- Reviewing project planning for team/project.
- Estimates, tracks & completes project on time and within budget.
- Monitor team/project status through daily meeting, review activities: check task status (quality & schedule), detect & raise risk & issue; analyze impact; follow up countermeasures action items.
- Weekly report: Summary status, help needed.
- Organize knowledge sharing activities & skill-up activities.
• People Management:
- Show members that you trust them, they will take ownership of their own work and only look to you for advice when they need it.
- Stay patient and calm during the most trying of circumstances. (ex: members are losing their cool).
• Good communication: ability to get along with others, ability to persuade others, ability to get others to listen to your ideas, clarity of what you say.
• Leadership Skills: give members what they need to succeed, be optimistic, give praise where praise is due.
Yêu cầu công việc: * MUST HAVE
• Having experience with project management and related experience.
• Upper-Intermediate level of one of backend programming language: Scala (preferred), Java or NodeJs.
• Experience with Rest API/web application/standalone application (cron job) programming/debugging.
• Experience in designing and developing backend APIs and services on relational databases such as Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL or NoSQL database such as Couchbase, Elasticsearch, MongoDB.
• Having experience with microservices architecture, SOA, OOP, design patterns, multi-threaded programming/concurrent processing, distributed data architecture design, algorithms.
• Proficiency in at least two backend programming languages (ex: Java and Golang) or a front-end framework/library (ex: Angular, ReactJS, React Native).
• Experience with one of the message queuing technologies such as RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, Oracle Advance Queue, IBM Message Queue, Apache Kafka, Redis.
• Familiarity with modern build/deploy pipelines and tools (Jenkin, Docker, Kubernetes).
• Have knowledge of linux OS (CentOS, Ubuntu) and related tools (SSH tool, terminal usage).
• Familiar with source version control (e.g., GIT, SVN, CVS, TFS, Mercurial, Bitbucket, etc.).
• Have knowledge about Unit Test, TDD.
• Familiar with working processes: Agile/Scrum.
• Work well in teams or groups.
• Proven ability to solve problems creatively.
• Bachelor’s Degree or above in Electronic Engineering, Telecommunication, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Automation, Information Technology or equivalent.
• Fluent in both written and spoken English.
* NICE TO HAVE
• Having Scrum certification (Scrum Master, Scrum Product Owner) or PMP/PMI certification is an advantage.
* COMPANY BENEFITS
• 13th Salary + Performance Bonus.
• Pass Probation Bonus.
• Premium healthcare insurance benefits (PVI Insurance package) and family medical benefit (based on the level of experience).
• Provide the famous e-learning platform-Udemy, to encourage continuous learning to adapt to the T-shape model.
• Flexible working time: only 8 hours required as continual working-time at the office.
• Annual leave up to 17 days: 12 days paid leave + 5 days’ sick leave.
• Professional and Personal Development Training Programs.
• 4 Stars standard company trip in summer and a big annual Year-End-Party.
• Coffee and snacks provided.
• Holiday celebrations and parties for team members and family.

KỸ NĂNG: Embedded, C Language, RTOS
Mô tả công việc: - Fixing bugs for the current software
- Completing documents such as UML design + Requirement Completing
- Analyzing new or changed software requirements to adjust to the corresponding software
- Analyzing logical business and software for each current module to ensure all normal running cases as well as abnormalities that may occur with this software module.
- Analyzing performance and model communication between software module and the remaining to optimize about logical processing.
- Giving solutions to optimize the current software or handle logic better/enough cases
- Taking part in new component development for Nextgen
- Analyzing the interface and integration of software module
Yêu cầu công việc: - At least 3 years of experience in Embedded Software Development:
+ Experience with review of source code and fixing potential software bugs in software.
+ Experience with static code analysis and fixing deviations.
+ Experience with version control, CI-CD system (Jenkins) and change management tools.
+ Understanding compilation process (linking, preprocessing, optimization etc)
- Strong embedded C programming:
+ Strong logical thinking in using C language.
+ Understand or used to work with C in MCU (Microcontroller) environment.
+ Have knowledge about Misra/Cert-C
- Experience in real-time operating systems:
+ Used to work at least 1 time in Realtime operating system.
+ Understand the main requirements such as protect resource (mutex/ spinlock)
+ Understand about how Runnable work in task and how it schedules.
- Experience in AUTOSAR RTE:
+ Know and understand about RTE APIs and their using.
+ Know and understand about the interfaces with the under layer of AUTOSAR Basic Software layer such as COM/ DCM/ NvM/ BswM & EcuM

LĨNH VỰC: Kỹ thuật xây dựng/Cơ sở hạ tầng
KỸ NĂNG: Information Technology, Technology, Desktop Hardware, Service Desk
Mô tả công việc: 1. Why you'll love working here:
- English training programs
- Competitive compensation and benefit package
- Young, dynamic international working environment
2. Job Description

- Service Desk Specialist has primary day-to-day support responsibility for the company information systems and software applications support. This includes end-user support, service desk activities, problem resolution both on-site and remotely;

- Service Desk Specialist works closely with IT partners including contractors, IT members of the company, region, global and users to provide solutions to immediate problems as well as working on ongoing projects and support. This includes gaining and maintaining knowledge expertise in software and hardware applications, systems support techniques, support procedures and contingency planning;
- Good communication and writing skills, as well, as good rapport with people and ability to handle stressful circumstances is required

- Service Desk Specialist is expected to project a strong company image by providing and promoting loyalty, dedication, presentation and professionalism through close interaction and direction with all staff members, customers and management.
3. Your role & responsibilities

- Directly monitor, receive and resolve the required issues on the Service Desk system as specified in the SLAs - Service-Level Agreements; Actively troubleshoot technical problems by taking full ownership until an issue is resolved. Communicate technical solutions to peers, managers, and across the organization as needed;
- Install and maintain operating systems and application software on users' computers;
- Mobile device support, security, and maintenance (if applicable)
- Assist in maintaining inventories of all equipment and software and establish standard configuration and operating procedures;
- Ensure the accuracy and integrity of IT assets and software licenses;
- Create and update documents and knowledge articles.
- Cross train with other members of the IT section/ IT sub-contractors;
- Develop proactive solutions and document instructions and procedures to reduce routine calls to the Service Desk;
- Participate in projects for improving the effectiveness and goodwill of the IT Section;
- Perform other reasonable duties as required.
Yêu cầu công việc: 1. Qualifications/Experience:
- University or College degree in Information Technology and other relevant majors.
- 1 to 2 years of relevant experience (Junior Level)
- Previous experience using ServiceNow, SCCM, PDQ.
- English level (CEFR) B1 or equivalent is a plus
- ITIL4 Foundation Certification desired (but not required)
2. Technical knowledge and skills:
- Understanding of desktop support and OSI model and computer networking principles (Firewalls, Network Protocols, Subnetting).
- Having knowledge of Windows 10, Windows Server, Active Directory, ADManager, Office 365 and other technologies (ie SQL/Virtual servers).
- Knowledge of mobile computing platforms (Android, iOS).
- Customer Service: Exceptional organizational skills and time management skills with a strong focus on customer service.

company_name: Công Ty TNHH Olam Việt Nam
NGÀNH NGHỀ: Quản Lý Dự Án Công Nghệ
LĨNH VỰC: Sản xuất
KỸ NĂNG: IT Operations, Power Apps, Software Engineering, Computer Science, Power Automate
Mô tả công việc: As a Senior Digital Transformation , scope includes understanding the business needs, analysing processes, and identifying opportunities for improvement. When working with Power Apps, your role involves translating these requirements into technical solutions that meets the business objective.

Requirement gathering is a critical aspect of your role, as it involves working closely with stakeholders to gather, document, and prioritize business requirements. This information is then used to create a Business Development Requirement that outlines the scope of the project, the objectives, and the expected deliverables. The role as well involves designing the app with the end-users in mind, making it intuitive and user-friendly.User adoption is key to the success of any project. To encourage user adoption, it is important to involve users early in the process, gather feedback, and provide training and support to ensure that they are comfortable using the app.By following a structured approach to requirement gathering, focusing on the project goals, prioritizing user adoption, and developing solutions based on the Business Requirement Development, you can ensure the success of your Power App development project as a Business Development Analysis executive.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Work closely with users and identify the pain area and map the business requirement.
2.Identify and research potential digital solutions.
3.Developing auto-workflow/web-app/report using Power Apps, Power Automate, and SharePoint
4.Coordinate with business teams to develop mutually beneficial proposals.
5. Drive the end-to-end Business Application process
6. Preparing BRD (if assigned)
7. Conducting training and preparing UAT and gathering, validating, and documenting business requirements; analysing data
8. Maintaining and enhancing system performance
9. Supporting users when issues arise
Yêu cầu công việc: 1. Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, IT, Computer Science, Software Engineering is a plus
2. 3-7 years experience in business processes is referred
3. Having practical knowledge of project management is a plus
4. Ability to listen, comprehend, analyses, understand, and abstract information from end users
5. Excellent communication skill, must be fluent in English
6. Job demands to travel different ofi locations within Vietnam.
7. Should have attitude towards learning new technology.
8. Interest in continuous optimizing the process.
9. Individual Contributor role and must be a high performer, high commitment
10. Skill: Effective stakeholder engagement; Critical thinking; Problem solving; Good listener & communicator and Analytical thinking

job_name: Senior Business Intelligence Executive, ZaloPay (User Growth)
LĨNH VỰC: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
KỸ NĂNG: Data Analysis, Strategic Planning, CRM, SQL, Management Consulting
Mô tả công việc: As a Senior Business Intelligence Executive, you will play a pivotal role in driving strategic initiatives to achieve User Growth & Retention KPI within the assigned budget. Your responsibilities will include:
- Strategic Planning (30%): Develop and implement strategies to achieve KPIs related to user metrics within allocated budgets.
- Data Analysis and Insights (30%): Analyze data to derive actionable insights to enhance user retention, optimize costs, and improve user conversion rates.

- CRM R&D (20%): Act as the R&D for the in-house CRM tool, known as NBA (Next Best Action), and collaborate with cross-functional teams to generate a user feature-set of behaviors, experiment, analyze, and optimize user journeys for effective retargeting.

- Collaboration with Data Science (20%): Collaborate with the Data Science team to create innovative data solutions that support excellent operations and optimize the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.
Yêu cầu công việc: To be successful in this role, the ideal candidate should possess the following qualifications:
- Technical Proficiency: Mastery of Excel, PowerPoint, SQL, and Python for effective data analysis and reporting.
- 4-5 years experience in one or more of the following areas: Management Consultant, Consumer Tech, Banking & Financial Industry with a track record of analyzing data related to user behavior.
- Strong business acumen and a history of involvement in projects related to product enhancement and cost optimization.
- Experience in conducting A/B tests and active participation in projects related to Data Science
- Project management experience is a plus, showcasing your ability to handle multifaceted responsibilities and deliver successful outcomes.

job_name: Chuyên Viên Công Nghệ Thông Tin -Trường Brighton College Vietnam
company_name: Trường Quốc Tế Brighton College Việt Nam
LĨNH VỰC: Giáo dục/Đào Tạo
KỸ NĂNG: Công Nghệ Thông Tin, Quản Trị Hệ Thống, IT System Administration, Quản Trị Mạng
Mô tả công việc: Trường Brighton College Việt Nam tọa lạc tại Khu đô thị Vinhomes Ocean Park, Gia Lâm, Hà Nội đã mở cửa đón hơn 300 học sinh vào tháng 8 năm 2023 và đang tiếp tục mở rộng với dự kiến số lượng học sinh sẽ tăng gấp đôi. Đây là cơ sở đầu tiên được thành lập trong khuôn khổ hợp tác giữa tập đoàn Vingroup và trường Brighton College, một trong những trường tư thục hàng đầu của Vương quốc Anh với gần 200 năm lịch sử.

Trong năm học mới 2024 – 2025, Trường Brighton College Vietnam cần tuyển Chuyên viên công nghệ thông tin, làm việc tại cơ sở trường tại Khu đô thị Vinhomes Ocean Park, Xã Đa Tốn, Huyện Gia Lâm, Hà Nội.
I. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
•	Giám sát, vận hành hạ tầng cloud cho các hệ thống/sản phẩm quan trọng của công ty.
•	Phân tích tìm nguyên nhân gốc đưa ra các giải pháp xử lý triệt để các sự cố.
•	Tham gia tối ưu, cải thiện hiệu năng hệ thống.
•	Duy trì và vận hành hệ thống, thống kê, báo cáo định kỳ chất lượng hệ thống.
•	Tuân thủ và Áp dụng, duy trì các tiêu chuẩn, hướng dẫn ATTT mức hệ điều hành, backend: web server, database... trên các hệ thống của công ty.
•	Quản trị hệ thống lưu trữ, sao lưu dữ liệu.
•	Tham gia triển khai các dự án hạ tầng CNTT.
Yêu cầu công việc: II. YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC:
•	Có kiến thức về hệ thống cơ sở hạ tầng máy chủ, nền tảng ảo hóa như: VMware vSphere, Openstack, Proxmox hoặc các hệ thống nguồn mở khác.
•	Kiến thức về quản trị hệ thống máy chủ Window, Linux/Unix.
•	Kỹ năng phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề, giao tiếp, làm việc theo nhóm.
•	Có kinh nghiệm hoặc kiến thức về các dịch vụ của AWS (EC2, S3 storage, SES, Lambda,…)
•	Có kiến thức hiểu biết về một hoặc nhiều các dịch vụ máy chủ như Proxy, web server, HA Proxy, K8S, Elastic Search, Redis…
•	Có kinh nghiệm triển khai, tối ưu hóa về SQL và NoSQL như SQL, MySQL, Amazon DynamoDB.
•	Có kinh nghiệm với các công cụ giám sát (Zabbix, Grafana, ELK …).
•	Chứng chỉ về quản trị và vận hành hệ thống MCSA, MCSP, CCNP.
•	Có 3 đến 5 năm kinh nghiệm về lĩnh vực: Triển khai các giải pháp/hệ thống công nghệ thông tin hoặc vận hành hạ tầng công nghệ.
•	Tiếng Anh (chuyên ngành IT).
III. CHẾ ĐỘ ĐÃI NGỘ & PHÚC LỢI
•	Mức lương: Thỏa thuận theo năng lực, cực kỳ cạnh tranh.
•	Đầy đủ các chế độ bảo hiểm theo luật quy định, chế độ bảo hiểm sức khỏe riêng dành cho CBNV thuộc tập đoàn Vingroup.
•	Chế độ ưu đãi khi sử dụng các dịch vụ tại các Công ty thuộc hệ sinh thái của Tập đoàn Vingroup.
•	Cơ hội thăng tiến và phát triển bản thân.
•	Cơ hội làm việc trong một môi trường giáo dục quốc tế chuyên nghiệp, năng động và có tính thách thức cao.
•	Cơ hội học hỏi và phát triển khi được làm việc với các nhà giáo dục quốc tế hàng đầu.

Brighton College Việt Nam coi vấn đề an toàn học sinh là ưu tiên hàng đầu, chính vì vậy các ứng viên đều được tìm hiểu kỹ càng về lý lịch trước khi phỏng vấn. Sau khi được lựa chọn, ứng viên sẽ tiếp tục trải qua vòng kiểm tra về tính xác thực của văn bằng, chứng chỉ mà mình đã cung cấp và kiểm tra về lý lịch tư pháp để đánh giá mức độ phù hợp khi làm việc với trẻ nhỏ. Các câu hỏi liên quan đến an toàn trẻ em và tuyển dụng an toàn sẽ được đặt ra trong quy trình lựa chọn ứng viên.
